La socia Marisol tiene 28 años de edad,es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos,la socia se dedica al negocio de fotocopiadora,la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m,la socia tiene 8 años en este negocio antes la socia se dedicaba al negocio de restaurant pero no le fue muy bien,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de fotocopiadora.La socia solicita el credito para comprar papeles y tintas para la fotocopiadora.

La socia esta feliz con el credito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Marisol is 28 years old, is in a common law marriage, and has two children.  She has a photocopy business, works from 8:00am to 7:00pm, and has been doing this for eight years.  She used to have a restaurant but it didn’t do well.  She wants to expand her photocopy business and is asking for this loan to buy paper and toner.

She is happy about the loan and promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy paper and toner.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es: La socia es la señora María, ella pertenece al banco comunal LOS DIAMANTES” de la ciudad del Cusco – Perú. la socia continua dedicándose a la enseñanza de diversas materias, dando clases particulares a niños que requieren refuerzo académico, María realiza esta actividad hace algunos años y esta le representa el principal ingreso económico y realización personal, ya que en un fituro ella quiere constituir una institución educativa inicial particular, María solicita el préstamo para comprar material didáctico como papelería, laminas, libros y software de computo para el desarrollo de sus clases.  María se siente agradecida con KIVA por el crédito otorgado  y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de las cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
The member, María, belongs to Los Diamantes Communal Bank in the city of Cusco, Peru.  She continues making a living teaching various subjects, giving private classes to children who need academic support.  María has done this work for several years and it represents her main income and personal achievement because in the future she wants to start a private elementary educational institute.

María's requesting the loan to buy teaching materials such as paper, charts, books, and computer software to develop her classes.

María's grateful to Kiva for the loan granted, and she pledges to make her payments punctually.

loans.use: to buy teaching materials

loans.name: Sonia

texts.es: La socia nació en la comunidad de Yanahuara de la provincia de Urubamba, ella tiene 42 años de edad, tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene tres hijos, ella pertenece al banco comunal “Señor de Huanca” de la Asociación Arariwa. Su actividad económica es la venta de verduras, frutas, animales menores, granos secos y chicha de jora. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar granos secos como por ejemplo maíz blanco. Agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en: [Sonia] was born in the Yanahuara community of the Urubamba province.  She’s 42 years old, is in a common law marriage, and has three children.  She is a member of the “Señor de Huanca” communal bank of the “Asociación Arariwa.”  She sells fruit, small animals, dried grains, and chicha.  On this occasion she needs a loan in order to buy dried grains such as white corn.  She is grateful to those who form a part of this dream and promises to make her payments on schedule.

loans.use: para comprar granos secos como por ejemplo maíz blanco.

loans.name: Nazaria

texts.es:
La socia Nazaria se dedica al negocio de confeccion de casacas de cueros,la socia confecciona casacas y lo vende en forma independiente llevando a diferentes tiendas,la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene 15 años en este negocio y le va muy bien,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de confeccion de casacas.La socia solicita el credito para comprar cueros  e hilos para confeccionar las casacas.

La socia esta feliz con el credito otorgado y se compromete c cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Ms. Nazaria sews leather jackets. She makes the jackets and sells them herself to different stores. She works from 8am until 6pm. She has been doing this business for the past fifteen years and it is going well. Her dream is to grow her jacket making business. She is asking for this loan in order to buy the leather and thread used to make the jackets.
She is thankful for this loan and promises to pay her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy the leather and thread used to make jackets.

loans.name: Rainer

texts.es: El socio es el señor Rainer, él pertenece al banco comunal LOS DIAMANTES” de la ciudad del Cusco – Perú. Rainer continua con su actividad como policía del estado, pero también apoya con el negocio familiar a su esposa, que es la venta de alimentos en su restaurante, actividad con la cual  saca adelante a su familia y que representa el principal ingreso económico y sustento de su familia. Rainer trabaja muy duro para sacar adelante su actividad complementaria y de esta manera  ofrecer un mejor futuro y educación a su hija, Rainer solicita el crédito para comprar insumos como verduras, fideos, menestras, arroz, carnes etc. para la producción de su restaurante. El socio  agradece a KIVA por  el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: Rainer is a member of the “LOS DIAMANTES” communal bank in the city of Cusco – Peru.  Rainer works as a state police officer, but also supports his wife with the family business; a restaurant with which they get the family ahead and is their main source of income.  Rainer works very hard to provide a better future and education to his daughter.  He is asking for this loan in order to buy ingredients such as vegetables, noodles, rice, meats, etc.  He is grateful to Kiva for the loan and promises to make his payments on time.

loans.use: to buy ingredients.

loans.name: Luisa Amanda

texts.es: Doña Luisa de 54 años de edad, siempre haciendo la lucha vendiendo sus productos de plásticos junto a su esposo  en las distintas pulpería de la capital y en zonas francas, sus tres hijos cada vez van creciendo ya el mayor tiene 27 años quien ya trabaja y con sus ingresos ayuda en los gastos del hogar, sus préstamos los ha venido utilizando en mejoras de su vivienda en esta ocasión con este treceavo crédito desea continuar y esta vez necesita comprar zinc, perlines arena, piedrín, bloques, cemento, inodoro y sus accesorios para instalar servicio higiénico y hacer división de baño, para tener una vivienda más digna.
texts.en: Ms. Luisa is 54 years old. She sells plastic products along with her husband. She sells them to certain stores in the capital and the neighboring areas. Her three children are getting older. The oldest one is 27 years old and works. His income helps with the household expenses. This loan will be used to improve her house. With her thirteenth loan she will buy zinc, metal supports, sand, small stones, bricks, cement, an outhouse with its accessories in order to have hygienic services and a bathing area in order to have a proper house.

loans.use: to buy zinc, metal supports, sand, small stone, bricks, cement, an outhouse for hygiene and a bathing area.

loans.name: Aurelia

texts.es: La socia nació en la ciudad de Quillabamba pero vive en Urubamba, ella tiene 55 años de edad es casada y fruto de esta hermosa relación tiene tres hijos, ella pertenece al banco comunal “Señor de Huanca” de la Asociación Arariwa. Su actividad económica principal es la agricultura y ganadería pero también se dedica a la venta de verduras, frutas, animales menores y chicha de jora. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar abono y mangueras. Agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en: [Aurelia] was born in Quillabamba but lives in Urubamba.  She is 55 years old, married, and has three children.  She’s a member of the “Señor de Huanca” communal bank of the “Asociación Arariwa.”  She farms and raises livestock, but also sells vegetables, fruits, small animals, and chicha.  On this occasion she needs a loan to buy fertilizer and hoses.  She is grateful to those who form part of this dream and promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and hoses.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es: La socia nació en la ciudad de Maras pero vive en Urubamba, ella tiene 35 años de edad es casada y fruto de esta hermosa relación tiene cuatro hijos, ella pertenece al banco comunal “Señor de Huanca” de la Asociación Arariwa. Su actividad económica principal es la agricultura y ganadería pero también se dedica a la venta de verduras y animales menores. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar abono. Agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en: [Rosa] was born in Maras but lives in Urubamba.  She is 35 years old, married and has four children.  She is a member of the “Señor de Huanca” communal bank of the Asociación Arariwa.  She farms and raises livestock but also sells vegetables and small animals.  On this occasion she needs a loan to buy fertilizer.  She is grateful to those who form part of this dream and promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer

loans.name: Engracia

texts.es: La socia nació en la provincia de Urubamba departamento del Cusco, ella tiene 33 años de edad es casada y fruto de esta hermosa relación tiene tres hijos, ella pertenece al banco comunal “Señor de Huanca” de la Asociación Arariwa. Su actividad económica principal es la agricultura y ganadería pero también se dedica a la elaboración de artesanía, crianza de animales menores (gallinas, cuyes y chanchos) y venta de verduras. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar gallinas. Agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en: [Engracia] was born in the Urubamba province, within the department of Cusco.  She is 33 years old, married, and has three children.  She is a member of the “Señor de Huanca” communal bank of the Asociación Arariwa and raises livestock, but also makes and sells art, raises small animals (chickens, Guinea pigs, and pigs), and sells vegetables.  On this occasion she needs a loan to buy chickens.  She is grateful to those who form part of this dream and promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy chickens.

loans.name: Akadi Group

texts.fr:
Mme ALIZETA est responsable du groupe  AKADI. Mariée, elle est mère de quatre (04) enfants. Le plus âgé a 23ans et le moins âgés à 15 ans. Deux (02) vont  à l’école et elle a 06 personnes  en charge.
Mme vend du jus et de l’eau fraiche depuis un an.  Elle s’approvisionne aux  marchés  de son secteur. Ses clients sont les habitants de son quartier.
Elle veut s’acheter  01 sac de sucre, 05 plats de petit mil, 03 plats bissap et 02 plats de gingembres.
Elle  veut renforcer  son activité avec ses bénéfices. Mme  ambitionne acheter une moto   et mieux scolariser ses enfants.
texts.en:
Ms. Alizeta is the leader of the "Akadi" group. She is a married mother of four children. The oldest is 23 and and the youngest is 15. Two of them go to school, and she has six people in her care.
Ms. Alizeta has sold juice and fresh water for a year. She gets her supplies in her area. Her customers are people who live in her area. She would like to buy one bag of sugar, five plates of pearl millet, three plates of hibiscus, and two plates of ginger.
She wants to strengthen her business with her profits. Her ambition is to buy a motorcycle and better educate her children.

loans.use: To buy one bag of sugar, five plates of pearl millet, three plates of hibiscus, and two plates of ginger.

loans.name: Brigida

texts.es: La socia vive en la provincia de Urubamba departamento del Cusco, ella tiene 46 años de edad es casada y fruto de esta hermosa relación tiene tres hijos, ella pertenece al banco comunal “Señor de Huanca” de la Asociación Arariwa. Su actividad económica principal es la crianza de animales menores y la venta de jora de chicha. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar maíz. Agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en: [Brigida] lives in the Urubamba province, within the department of Cusco.  She is 46 years old, married, and has three children.  She is a member of the “Señor de Huanca” communal bank of the Asociación Arariwa and raises small animals and sells chicha.  On this occasion she needs a loan to buy corn.  She is grateful to those who form part of this dream and promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy corn.

loans.name: Ubertina

texts.es: La socia vive en la provincia de Urubamba departamento del Cusco, ella tiene 32 años de edad es casada y fruto de esta hermosa relación tiene cinco hijos (Vane 17, celinda 16, Eulogia 12, Magda 10 y Yuliza 7 años de edad), ella pertenece al banco comunal “Señor de Huanca” de la Asociación Arariwa. Su actividad económica principal es la crianza de animales menores (Cuyes, chanchos y gallinas) y elaboración de chicha de jora. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar jora y gallinas. Agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The member lives in the province of Urubamba in the department of Cusco.  She's 32 years old and married, and from this beautiful relationship has five children (Vane, 18, Celinda, 16, Eulogia, 12, Magda, 10, y Yuliza, 7).  She belongs to Señor de Huanca Communal Bank of Asociación Arariwa.  Her main work is raising small animals (guinea pigs, pigs, and chickens) and making "chicha de jora" [corn liquor].

She needs this loan to buy fermented corn and chickens.

She's grateful to those who are part of her dream through this loan, and she's committed to making her payments punctually.

loans.use: to buy fermented corn and chickens

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to build a septic system.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to build a concrete patio.

loans.name: Enrique Avenamar

texts.es:
El señor Enrique es originario de la ciudad de Tapachula Chiapas, tiene ya mas de 30 años que radica en la ciudad de Nuevo Laredo.
El señor Enrique tiene un negocio de elaboración y venta de dulces de tamarindo y barritas congeladas de carios sabores en temporada de verano y en invierno se dedica a la elaboración y venta de dulces tamarindo. Esta solicitando un  nuevamente un préstamo para la comprar de material para la elaboración de los dulces ya que tiene varios pedidos pendientes para entregar. 
El señor Enrique es padre soltero y tiene un hijo bajo su responsabilidad el cual esta estudiando la secundaria. 
Con una parte de las ganancias que obtiene de su negocio será para pagar el crédito. El señor Enrique ya ha tenido tres créditos con KIVA los cuales a pagado puntual y han sido para invertir en su negocio, espera nuevamente contar con su cooperación en este crédito.
Desea  mejorar la calidad del sus productos y entregar a tiempo los pedidos que tiene en diferentes dulcería y tiendas de la ciudad.
texts.en:
Enrique is originally from Tapachula, Chiapas and has been in Nuevo Laredo for more than 30 years.

He has a business making and selling tamarind candy in the winter and frozen pops of different flavors in the summer.  He is asking for a new loan in order to buy candy making supplies since he has some orders to fill.

Enrique is a single father and has one son who attends junior high school.

He will repay the loan with part of the profits from his business.  Enrique has had three previous Kiva loans and has repaid them on time.  They have allowed him to invest in his business and he hopes for your cooperation once more.

He wants to improve the quality of his products and deliver his orders on time to various candy shops around the city.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Luzmila

texts.es: La socia nació en la provincia de Urubamba departamento del Cusco, ella tiene 24 años de edad es conviviente y fruto de esta hermosa relación tiene dos hijos (Joselyn y Diego de 7 y 3 años de edad respectivamente), ella pertenece al banco comunal “Señor de Huanca” de la Asociación Arariwa. Su actividad económica principal es la venta de comestibles, ella tiene una pequeña tienda de abarrotes en su casa, ella también se dedica a la venta de chicha de jora y crianza de animales menores como cuyes, chanchos y gallinas. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar maíz para elaborar chicha de jora. Agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en: [Luzmila] was born in the Urubamba province within the Cusco department.  She is 24 years old, is in a common law marriage, and has two children. (Joselyn and Diego, ages 7 and 3).  She is a member of the “Señor de Huanca” communal bank of the Asociación Arariwa and sells food.  She has a small grocery store in her home and also sells chicha and raises small animals such as Guinea pigs, pigs, and chickens.  On this occasion she needs a loan to buy corn to make chicha.  She is grateful to those who form a part of this dream and promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy corn.

loans.name: Alexander

texts.es: Alexander es un señor esforzado. el desea poder seguir realizando sus proyectos. es por eso que el necesita un prestamo por seiscientos mil colones exactos (600.000) para compra de fungicidas, herbicidas e insecticidas, ademas de pagar la mano de obra para asistir a la siembra. el negocio de alexander es sembrar granos basicos y venderlos a la asociacion del pueblo. es por ello que este prestamo le ayudara a lograr una mejor cosecha.
texts.en: Alexander is a hardworking man who wants to continue with his plans.  He needs a loan of 600 Colones to buy fungicide, herbicides, and pay for labor to help with his plantings.  Alexander’s business is raising basic grains and selling them in town.  This loan will help him realize his harvest.

loans.use: Compra de Fungicidas, insecticidas y mano de obra

loans.name: Mario

texts.es:
Mario es un señor que ha vivido de la ganaderia. el necesita comprar terneras para engondarlas y venderlas y asi generar ganancia. es por esto que necesita de seiscientos mil colones ((₡600.000) para comprar estas terneras.
esto le generara un dinero que usara para poder vivir y mantener a us familia.
texts.en: Mario has lived off of livestock and needs to buy calves to fatten them up and sell them for a profit.  He needs a loan of ₡6,000,000 ($1,225) to buy these calves.  This will earn him money to support his family.

loans.use: to buy calves.

loans.name: Mauricio

texts.es: Mauricio ha vivido de la agricultura, el siembra semillas de maiz y las vende a la comunidad y a la Asociacion. necesita de un prestamo por seiscientos mil colones (600.000) para comprar semillas, abono granular, herbicias, fungicidas y pagar la mano de obra. esto le permitira poder tener la materia prima necesaria para producir y asi conseguir el dinero necesario para alimentar a su familia.
texts.en: Mauricio has lived off of farming and raises corn and sells it in the local community.  He needs a loan of 600,000 Colones to buy seed, fertilizer, herbicides, fungicides, and to pay for labor.  This will allow him to have the necessary supplies to produce and earn money to feed his family.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer and labor.

loans.name: Jesusa

texts.es: La socia vive en la provincia de Urubamba departamento del Cusco, ella tiene 47 años de edad es divorciada pero tiene cuatro hijos (Jhon Peter, Fernando, Arnold y Jusmer de 22, 20, 18 y 14 años de edad respectivamente), ella pertenece al banco comunal “Señor de Huanca” de la Asociación Arariwa. Su actividad económica principal es la venta de fruta, chicha de jora, gallinas y cuyes. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar maíz para elaborar chicha de jora. Agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en: Jesusa lives in the province of Ururbamba, in the department of Cusco. She is 47 years old. She is divorced but she has four sons (Jhon Peter, Fernando, Arnold, and Jusmer, who are 22, 20, 18, and 14 years old, respectively). She belongs to Asociación Arariwa’s  “Señor de Huanca” communal bank. Her main economic activity is selling fruit, a fermented corn drink, chickens, and guinea pigs. She currently needs the loan to buy corn for making her fermented corn drink. She is grateful to those are a part of her dream through the loan program. She pledges to make her repayments in the established timeframe.

loans.use: to buy corn for making a fermented corn drink.

loans.name: Amancio

texts.es: Amancio es un señor muy luchador, desea poder seguir realizando sus proyectos, es por eso que  necesita un préstamo por setecientos cincuenta mil colones exactos (¢750.000) para comprar fungicidas, herbicidas e insecticidas para tratar el cultivo durante el desarrollo, además de pagar  mano de obra para darle mantenimiento a la cosecha. el negocio de Amancio es sembrar granos básicos y venderlos a la asociación de acopio local. Es por ello que este préstamo le ayudará a mejorar la cosecha y poder seguir viviendo de lo que genere.
texts.en: Amancio is a hardworking man. He wants to continue with the work he is doing. This is why he needs a loan for CRC 750,000 (Costa Rican colones) to buy fungicides, herbicides, and insecticides to treat the crop as it progresses. He will also pay for labor to maintain his crops. Amancio’s business is planting basic grains and selling them to the town’s cooperative. This loan will help him improve his harvest so that he can continue living on what he earns.

loans.use: to buy herbicides, fungicides, and to pay for labor.

loans.name: Yaneth

texts.es: La socia vive en la provincia de Urubamba departamento del Cusco, ella tiene 34 años de edad es conviviente tiene un hijo (Joel Antony de un año de edad), ella pertenece al banco comunal “Señor de Huanca” de la Asociación Arariwa. Su actividad económica principal es la crianza de animales menores y comestibles. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar mercadería como sacos de azúcar y sacos de arroz. Agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en: Yaneth lives in the province of Ururbamba, in the department of Cusco. She is 34 years old. She lives with her partner, and she has a son (Joel Antony, who is one year old). She belongs to Asociación Arariwa’s “Señor de Huanca” communal bank. Her main economic activity is raising small animals and selling food items. She currently needs the loan to buy merchandise such as sacks of sugar and sacks of rice. She is grateful to those who are part of this dream through the loan program. She pledges to make her repayments within the established timeframe.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as sacks of sugar and sacks of rice.

loans.name: Victoria

texts.es: La socia vive en la provincia de Urubamba departamento del Cusco, ella tiene 34 años de edad es casada tiene tres hijos, ella pertenece al banco comunal “Señor de Huanca” de la Asociación Arariwa. Su actividad económica principal es la elaboración de chicha de jora y venta de verduras. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar mercadería para implementar una tienda de abarrotes y va comprar sacos de azúcar y sacos de arroz. Agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
This member lives in the province of Urubamba, administrative division of Cusco. She is 34 years old and is married with three children. She belongs to the communal bank “Señor de Huanca” of the "Asociación Arariwa". Her main economical activity is the preparation of traditional corn liquor and the sale of vegetables. 

This time, she requires the loan in order to buy merchandise to set up a grocery store and to buy sacks of sugar and rice. 

She thanks whomever is a part of this dream through these means and she is committed to make her installment payments on time.

loans.use: to buy sacks of sugar and rice.

loans.name: Virginia

texts.es: La socia vive en la provincia de Urubamba departamento del Cusco, ella tiene 42 años de edad es viuda tiene tres hijos, ella pertenece al banco comunal “Señor de Huanca” de la Asociación Arariwa. Su actividad económica principal es la crianza de animales menores como patos, gallinas y patos. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para hacer mantenimiento de la casa va comprar gradas. Agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en: Virginia lives in the province of Ururbamba, in the department of Cusco. She is 42 years old. She is a widow and has three children. She belongs to the Asociación Arariwa’s “Señor de Huanca” communal bank. Her main economic activity is raising small animals such as ducks and chickens. She currently needs the loan to do some maintenance work on her house and buy stair steps. She is grateful to those who are part of this dream through the loan program. She pledges to make her repayments within the established timeframe.

loans.use: to do some maintenance work on her house and buy stair steps.

loans.name: Marleni

texts.es: La socia es Marleni, ella pertenece al banco comunal LOS DIAMANTES” de la ciudad del Cusco – Perú. la socia continua dedicándose a la venta de ropa para damas, caballeros y niños, ropa que distribuye de forma directa y a solicitud de sus clientes y comercios, Marleni realiza esta actividad hace algunos años y esta le representa su principal ingreso económico y sustento de su familia, Marleni solicita el préstamo para comprar mercadería como pantalones, casacas, camisas, polos etc. para capitalizar su actividad para la próxima campaña navideña.  Marleni se siente agradecida con KIVA por el crédito otorgado  y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de las cuotas establecidas.
texts.en: Marleni belongs to the “Los Diamantes” communal bank in the city of Cusco, Peru. She continues to focus on selling clothing for women, men, and children. She distributes the clothing directly and by request to her customers and businesses. Marleni has been in this business for a few years. It represents her main source of income and it’s how she supports her family. Marleni is requesting a loan to buy merchandise such as pants, jackets, polo shirts, etc. to stock up for the coming Christmas season. Marleni is grateful to Kiva for the loan that has been granted, and she pledges to make her repayments.

loans.use: to buy pants, jackets, polo shirts, etc. for the Christmas season.

loans.name: Agripina

texts.es: La socia vive en la provincia de Urubamba departamento del Cusco, ella tiene 35 años de edad es conviviente y fruto de esta relacion tiene dos hijos, ella pertenece al banco comunal “Señor de Huanca” de la Asociación Arariwa. Su actividad económica principal es la agricultura o sea cultiva hortalizas como papas, maíz, habas y trigos. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para alquilar maquinaria como un tractor para cultivar. Agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The borrower lives in the province of Urubamba in Cusco department. She is 35 years old, lives with her partner, and has two children. She belongs to the "Señor de Huanca" communal bank of the Asociación Arariwa. Her main livelihood is farming, and she grows vegetables, potatoes, corn, lima beans and wheat.

On this occasion, she needs the loan in order to rent machinery such as a tractor for her farm work.

She is thankful to those who form part of this dream by this means, and promises to make her installment payments within the established timeframe.

loans.use: To rent machinery such as a tractor for her farm work.

loans.name: Saturnina

texts.es: La socia vive en la provincia de Urubamba departamento del Cusco, ella tiene 33 años de edad es conviviente y fruto de esta relación tiene cuatro hijos, ella pertenece al banco comunal “Señor de Huanca” de la Asociación Arariwa. Su actividad económica principal es la crianza de animales menores como gallinas, cuyes. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar gallinas y cuyes. Agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en: Saturnina lives in the province of Ururbamba, in the department of Cusco. She is 33 years old. She lives with her partner, with whom she has four children. She belongs to Asociación Arariwa’s “Señor de Huanca” communal bank. Her main economic activity is raising small animals such as chickens and guinea pigs. She currently needs the loan to buy chickens and guinea pigs. She is grateful to those who are part of this dream through the loan program. She pledges to make her repayments within the established timeframe.

loans.use: to buy chickens and guinea pigs.

loans.name: Lurdes

texts.es: La socia vive en la provincia de Urubamba departamento del Cusco, ella tiene 36 años de edad es conviviente y fruto de esta relación tiene tres hijos, ella pertenece al banco comunal “Señor de Huanca” de la Asociación Arariwa. Su actividad económica principal es la venta de chicha, elaboración de pollipapas y venta de cerveza. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para insumos como pollos, salchipapas, papas y otras cosas más. Agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
This member, 36, lives in the province of Urubamba in the department of Cusco with her common-law husband and their three children.  She belongs to the communal bank "Señor de Huanca" of the Arariwa Association.  Her main business is selling "chicha" (corn-based drink), chicken with potatoes and beer.  

On this occasion she needs a loan to buy supplies such as chicken, hot dogs, potatoes and other items.  She is grateful to all who are helping her reach her goal and is committed to paying back the loan on time.

loans.use: To buy supplies such as chicken, hot dogs, potates and other items.

loans.name: Cleofe Eufemia

texts.es: La socia es la señora Cleofe, ella pertenece al banco comunal "LOS DIAMANTES” de la ciudad del Cusco – Perú. la socia continua dedicándose a la carpintería, principalmente en la fabricación de ataúdes, Cleofe realiza esta actividad familiar hace algunos años junto a su esposo, y esta le representa su principal ingreso económico y sustento de su familia, Cleofe solicita el préstamo para comprar materiales como madera, pintura, pegamento etc. para la fabricación de sus productos.  Cleofe se siente agradecida con KIVA por el crédito otorgado y por ayudarla con el mantenimiento y fortalecimiento de su actividad.
texts.en:
This member's name is Cleofe and she belongs to the communal bank "LOS DIAMANTES" of the city of Cusco in Peru.  She is still in the carpentry business, mainly making coffins.  Cleofe has been in this family business for several years with her husband, and it is the main source of income for her family.  

Cleofe is requesting a loan to buy materials such as wood, paint, glue, etc. to make her products.  She is grateful to KIVA for the loan and for helping her maintain and strengthen her business.

loans.use: To buy wood, glue and paint for her carpentry.

loans.name: Carmen

texts.es: La socia es la señora Carmen, ella pertenece al banco comunal LOS DIAMANTES” de la ciudad del Cusco – Perú. la socia continua dedicándose a la venta de productos de primera necesidad en su tienda de abarrotes, actividad que viene realizando hace muchos años y que  representa el principal ingreso económico y sustento de su familia Carmen solicita el préstamo para comprar mercadería como arroz, azúcar, fideos, leche, bebidas etc. para capitalizar su comercio.  Carmen se siente agradecida con KIVA por el crédito otorgado y por ayudarla con el mantenimiento y fortalecimiento de su actividad.
texts.en:
This member's  name is Carmen and she belongs to the communal bank "LOS DIAMANTES" in the city of Cusco in Peru.  She continues to sell basic staples in her grocery store.  She has been in business for several years and this is the main source of income for her family.

Carmen is requesting a loan to buy goods such as rice, sugar, noodles, milk, beverages, etc. to stock her store.  Carmen is grateful to KIVA for the loan and for helping her maintain and strengthen her business.

loans.use: To buy rice, sugar, noodles, beverages, etc. for her grocery store.

loans.name: Bruno

texts.es:
El socio nació en la ciudad del Cusco y vive en la misma ciudad donde nació, él tiene 38 años de edad es conviviente y fruto de esta relación tiene un hijo, él pertenece al banco comunal “Santa Rosita de Lima” de la Asociación Arariwa.

Su actividad económica principal es la compra de ropa para luego venderlo a diferentes revendedores. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar polos, pantalones, chompas, blusas y otras cosas más.    Agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
This member, 38, was born in the city of Cusco, where he continues to live with his common-law wife and son.  The communal bank he belongs to is "Santa Rosita de Lima" of the Arariwa Association.

His main business is buying and selling clothing to other vendors.  On this occasion, he is requesting a loan to buy polo shirts, pants, sweaters, blouses and other items.  He is grateful to everyone taking part in his dream through the loan and is committed to paying it back on time.

loans.use: To buy polo shirts, pants, sweaters, blouses and other items.

loans.name: Marina

texts.es: La socia es Marina, ella pertenece al banco comunal “LOS DIAMANTES” de la ciudad del Cusco – Perú. la socia continua dedicándose a la venta de ropa para damas, caballeros y niños, ropa que distribuye de forma directa y a solicitud de sus clientes, y paralelamente también se dedica a la venta de alimentos en su restaurante. Marina realiza estas actividades hace algunos años y estos le representa su principal ingreso económico y sustento de su familia, Marina solicita el préstamo para comprar mercadería como pantalones, casacas, camisas, polos etc. para capitalizar su actividad para la próxima campaña navideña.  Marina se siente agradecida con KIVA por el crédito otorgado  y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de las cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
This member's name is Marina and she belongs to the communal bank "LOS DIAMANTES" in the city of Cusco in Peru.  She continues to sell women's, men's and children's clothing directly to her customers on an order basis.  She also sells food at her restaurant.  Marina has been in business for several years and is the main bread winner for her household.

Marina is requesting a loan to buy merchandise such as pants, jackets, shirts, polo shirts, etc. to stock her business for the Christmas season.  She is grateful to KIVA for the loan and committed to paying it back on time.

loans.use: To buy pants, jackets, shirts and polo shirts.

loans.name: Felinda Caridad

texts.es:
En el cantón Rocafuerte se  reúnen cada quince días las socias del Banco Comunal Dulce Amistad. Este lugar se lo conoce por sus deliciosos dulces que preparan los lugareños que son reconocidos en todo en todo el país y por la calidez de su gente amable y trabajadora.

En este lugar vive la señora Felinda, tiene 65 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tiene tres hijos todos mayores de edad e independientes. Su esposo es agricultor y ganadero.

Doña Felinda tiene un comedor en un sitio turístico en las Jaguas de Rocafuerte, este lugar está atravesado por el Rio Portoviejo lo cual es muy atractivo  para los visitantes, ya que aquí aprovechan para bañarse y pasar un lindo dia en unión de sus familias. Trabaja en su comedor los días sábados y domingos, y ofrece una gran variedad de platos sobretodo los platos típicos de la provincia, su especialidad es el caldo y el seco de gallina criolla el cual es un plato muy solicitado por sus clientes, lleva con su negocio más de seis  años y le va muy bien.

Este crédito es para comprar los víveres necesarios para preparar los alimentos. Es socia fundadora del Banco comunal y le gusta porque siempre le ayudan con los créditos.

Su sueño es tener un gran restaurante.
texts.en:
In the Rocafuerte area, members of Banco Comunal Dulce Amistad (Sweet Friendship Communal Bank) meet every fortnight. This area is known for its delicious sweet treats which are prepared by locals who are renowned all over the country for being warm, friendly and hard-working. 

Felinda, aged 65 and married with three grown up and independent children, lives in this area. Her husband is a farmer and stockbreeder. 

Felind has a café in a tourist site in Jaguas de Rocafuerte. The river Portoviejo crosses this place and so it's very attractive to visitors who can swim and have a lovely day together with their families. She works on Saturdays and Sundays and offers a large variety of dishes especially typical local dishes. Her speciality is broth and chicken stew which is in high demand from her customers. She has had this business for 6 years and it is going very well.

This loan is to help her buy necessary ingredients so she can make the meals. She is a founding member of the communal bank and she likes it because they always help her with loans.  

Her dream is to have a big restaurant.

loans.use: to buy provisions

loans.name: Filerma Narciza

texts.es:
En el cantón Rocafuerte se  reúnen cada quince días las socias del Banco Comunal Dulce Amistad. Este lugar se lo conoce por sus deliciosos dulces que preparan los lugareños que son reconocidos en todo en todo el país y por la calidez de su gente amable y trabajadora.

En este lugar vive la  señora Filerma, tiene 54 años de edad, está divorciada pero de esa relación tiene cuatro hijos los cuales ya son mayores de edad y uno de ellos aun viven con ella.
 
Doña Filerma aprendió hace varios años corte y confección en una Academia en Playa Prieta, es modista y tiene un pequeño taller de costura donde desde hace muchos años se dedica a coser, confecciona todo tipo de ropa pero lo que más le gusta hacer en ropa de niñas y ropa casual, trabaja a base de pedidos de personas particulares que le encargan lo que necesitan. Trabaja todos los días desde las 6h00 hasta las 22h00 y a veces hasta más tarde cuando tiene pedidos que entregar,  lleva 20 años que se dedica a esta actividad y es así como saco adelante a sus hijos con el fruto de su trabajo.

Este nuevo crédito lo va utilizar en comprar telas hilos, cierres y otros materiales para la costura. Es socia fundadora del Banco comunal y le gusta porque los intereses son más bajos que en otras instituciones de crédito.
 
Su sueño es tener un taller más grande y mejores maquinas.
texts.en:
In the Rocafuerte area, members of Banco Comunal Dulce Amistad (Sweet Friendship Communal Bank) meet every fortnight. This area is known for its delicious sweet treats which are prepared by locals who are renowned all over the country for being warm, friendly and hard-working.

Filerma lives in this area. She is 54 years old, divorced but with four children from the relationship. They are all grown up and one of them still lives with her. 
 
Several years ago, Filerma learnt dressmaking at an academy in Playa Pieta. Now, she is a dressmaker and has a small workshop where she has sewed for many years. She makes all types of clothing but she most enjoys making girl's clothing and casual clothes.  She works based on orders from individuals who request what they need. She works everyday from 6am to 10pm and sometimes even later when she has orders that need finishing. She has done this for 20 years and with the profits of her hard work she has helped her children get ahead. 

She is going to use this new loan to buy fabric, threads, fasteners and other sewing materials. She is a founding member of the communal bank and she likes it because the interest rates are lower than in other lending institutions.
 
Her dream is to have a bigger workshop and better machines.

loans.use: to buy fabrics, threads, fasteners and other materials for sewing.

loans.name: Genny Dinora

texts.es:
En el cantón Rocafuerte se  reúnen cada quince días las socias del Banco Comunal Dulce Amistad. Este lugar se lo conoce por sus deliciosos dulces que preparan los lugareños que son reconocidos en todo en todo el país y por la calidez de su gente amable y trabajadora.

En este lugar vive la señora Genny, tiene 51 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tiene tres hijos de 19, 17 y 15 años que estudian el mayor en la universidad y los menores en colegio. Su esposo trabaja en el municipio de la localidad.

Doña Genny tiene una tienda de víveres en su casa, allí vende todo tipo de productos de primera necesidad así como también ciertos artículos de bazar y papelería, ella también se  dedica  a preparar dulces y comida que entrega a comerciantes que llevan a otras ciudades y también vende en su tienda, sus hijos le ayudan en su local cuando ella está preparando la comida y los dulces, lleva más de 15 años con su negocio el cual le deja muy buenas ganancias.

Este crédito es para comprar  azúcar, colorantes, harina y otros víveres para surtir más su tienda. Lleva varios años en el Banco Comunal y le gusta por la ayuda que siempre le dan con los créditos.

Su sueño es ver realizados a sus hijos.
texts.en:
In the district of Rocafuerte the group members of the Communal Bank "Sweet Friendship" meet every two weeks.  The area is known for its delicious sweets that are prepared by locals and it is recognized throughout the whole country for the warmth of the kind and hard-working people.  

This is where Mrs. Genny lives.  She is 51 years old, married, and she has three children ages 19, 17, and 15.  They are all students, the oldest in the University and the younger ones in high school.  Her husband works for the city government in their town.  

Mrs. Genny has a food store in her home, and she sells all kinds of basic needs products as well as certain party and paper products  She also works making sweets and foods for business people who take it to other cities. She also sells these items in her store.  Her children help her in her store when she is preparing food or sweets.  She has been working in this business for more than 15 years and it provides a good income.

This loan is for buying sugar, food coloring, flour, and other food items to stock her store.  Genny has been working for several years with the Communal Bank and she likes the help that it always offers via loans. 

Her dream is to see her children make it.

loans.use: to buy sugar, food coloring, flour, and other food items to stock her store.

loans.name: Judid Carolina

texts.es:
La socia nació en la provincia del Cusco y vive en la misma ciudad del Cusco, ella tiene 36 años de edad es casada y fruto de esta hermosa relación dos hijos, ella pertenece al banco comunal “Santa Rosita de Lima” de la Asociación Arariwa.

Su actividad económica principal es la administración de una carpintería donde se elabora diferentes muebles de madera. Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar madera y clavos. Agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
This group member was born in the province of Cusco and lives in the city of Cusco.  She is 36 years old and is married and has two children from this beautiful relationship.  She belongs to the communal bank "Santa Rosita de Lima" which is part of the Arariwa Association.

Her main economic activity is managing a carpentry shop where they make different kinds of furniture out of wood.  She has been working in this field for several years and it is going well.  At this time she needs a loan in order to buy wood and nails.  She thanks everyone who forms part of this dream by means of Kiva loans and she promises to comply with the payment of her debt via the established timetable.

loans.use: To purchase wood and nails.

loans.name: Alfredo Isaac

texts.es:
El socio nació en la ciudad de Trujillo pero vive en la hermosa ciudad del Cusco, él tiene 47 años de edad es casado y fruto de esta relación tiene dos hijos, él pertenece al banco comunal “Santa Rosita de Lima” de la Asociación Arariwa.

Su actividad económica principal es la elaboración y venta de muebles de madera y metal. Ya son 10 años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar materiales de trabajo como madera. Agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The member was born in the city of Trujillo but lives in the beautiful city of Cusco. He is 47 years old, is married and has two children from this relationship. 
He is a member of the communal bank "Santa Rosita de Lima" which belongs to the Arariwa Association. 

His main job is making and selling metal and wooden furniture. He has been doing this for the last 10 years and it is going very well. On this occasion, he is requesting a loan to buy work materials such as wood. He thanks all those who through this form part of this dream and promises to keep to repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy work materials such as wood.

loans.name: Grety

texts.es:
La socia nació en la provincia de La Convención pero vive en la ciudad del Cusco, ella tiene 34 años de edad es conviviente y fruto de esta hermosa relación tiene un hijo, ella pertenece al banco comunal “Santa Rosita de Lima” de la Asociación Arariwa.

Su actividad económica principal es la venta de ropa. Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar buzos y polos. Agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
This member was born in the province of La Convención, but she lives in the town of Cusco. She's 34 years old. She's in a common law marriage and has a son from this beautiful relationship. She's a member of the "Santa Rosita de Kima" communal bank of Asociación Arariwa.
Her main business is selling clothing. She has been in this line of work for several years and it's going very well. On this occasion she requests a loan in order to purchase track suits and polo shirts. She thanks those who become a part of her dream through this loan, and she pledges to make her repayments within schedule.

loans.use: to purchase track suits and polo shirts.

loans.name: María Auxiliadora

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Portoviejo, capital de Manabí conocida desde hace muchos años  como la ciudad de los reales tamarindos, se reúnen cada quince días  las socias del Banco Comunal Pequeños Comerciantes.

En este lugar vive la señora María, tiene 38 años de edad y fruto de esta relación tienen 4 hijos de 19, 17, 14 y 6 años de edad, dos de sus hijos estudian en colegio y el menor en escuela, todos sus hijos aun viven en su casa. Su esposo es comerciante.

La señora María con la intención de ganar algo por su cuenta y con esto poder salir adelante se dedica a vende ropa de todo tipo y ventas las realiza puerta a puerta.  Ella también le da parte del crédito al esposo para que él lo utilice en su negocio pues él se dedica a la venta de Cd, para lo cual tiene un puesto en una de la calles principales de la ciudad, él trabaja todos los días mientras que ella sale a sus recorridos unos dos o tres días de la semana. Ellos llevan más de 10 años con sus negocios los cual les permiten salir adelante honradamente.

Este crédito lo va emplear en comprar más mercadería como: pantalones, blusas, camisetas, CD de música y películas. Esta casi desde el inicio en el Banco Comunal y le gusta por la ayuda que le dan con los créditos.
  
Sus sueños son seguir adelante y que sus hijos terminen sus estudios y sean personas de bien.
texts.en:
The members of the "Pequeños Comerciantes" ("Small Retailers") communal bank gather together every 15 days in the town of Portoviejo, capital of Manabí. It has been known for several years as the city of the royal tamarind trees.
There lives María. She's 38 years old and from her marriage she has four children aged 19, 17, 14 and 6 years. Two of her children attend high school and the youngest one goes to elementary school. All her children still live with her. Her husband is in retail.
María intends to get an income of her own and therefore be able to get ahead. That's why she sells all types of clothing on a door-to-door basis. She also gives part of the loan to her husband in order for him to use it in his business. He sells CDs and owns a stall on one of the town's main streets. He works everyday, while she goes out on her sales route about two or three days a week. They have been in their respective lines of work for over 10 years and their businesses have allowed them to get ahead honorably.
She'll use this loan to purchase more merchandise such as trousers, blouses, t-shirts, music CDs and movies. She has been a member of the communal bank almost from day one and she likes it because of the help she gets with the loans.
Her dream is to move forward and see her children complete their education and be decent people.

loans.use: to purchase trousers, blouses, t-shirts, music CDs and movies.

loans.name: Valerio

texts.es:
El socio nació en la ciudad del Cusco y vive en la misma ciudad donde nació, él tiene 57 años de edad es soltero y no tiene hijos, él pertenece al banco comunal “Santa Rosita de Lima” de la Asociación Arariwa.

Su actividad económica principal es la venta de veneno para plagas y roedores. Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar veneno. Agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Valerio was born in the city of Cusco and still lives there now. He is 57 years old, and he is single with no children. He belongs to the communal bank "Santa Rosita de Lima" of the Asociación Arariwa.

His main source of income is selling poison for pests and rodents. He has been doing this for several years and it is going very well for him. With this opportunity he is asking for this loan to buy poison. He is grateful to those who are part of his dream through these loans and is committed to making his repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy poison to sell.

loans.name: Leonor Concepción

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Portoviejo, capital de Manabí conocida desde hace muchos años  como la ciudad de los reales tamarindos, se reúnen cada quince días  las socias del Banco Comunal Pequeños Comerciantes.

En este lugar vive la señora Leonor, tiene 37 años de edad, está casada y fruto de esta relación  tiene tres hijos de 14, 12 y 9 años, los mayores estudian en colegio y el menor  en  escuela. Su esposo es comerciante de legumbres en el mercado de la localidad.

La señora Leonor para poder ganar algo por su cuenta y con esto ayudar a sus hijos con los gastos de sus estudios se dedica al comercio,  vende  ropa de todo tipo y su forma de venta es puerta a puerta o bajo pedidos que le hacen sus clientes con anticipación, trabaja de tres a cuatro días por semana y unas cuatro horas al día. Su mercadería  la va a comprar a  Guayaquil ciudad a la que viaja una o dos veces al mes de acuerdo a las ventas que haga o los pedidos que tenga. Entrega a crédito y cobra semanalmente, lleva más de 10 años con su negocio y le va muy bien.

Este crédito lo va a utilizar en comprar ropa de todo tipo ya que al momento tiene algunos pedidos. Es socia fundadora del Banco Comunal y le gusta por la facilidad para realizar los créditos y los pagos.

Su sueño es tener un local comercial.
texts.en:
In the city of Portoviejo, the capital of Manabí known for many years as the city of the true tamarinds, the members of the "Pequeños Comerciantes" communal bank meet every fortnight.

In this place lives Señora Leonor. She is 37 years old, and is married with three children who are 14, 12 and 9 years old. The older ones study at secondary school and the youngest is in primary school. Her husband sells vegetables in the local market.

In order to make some of her own money, and with this help her children with the cost of their studies, Señora Leonor sells all kinds of clothes. She sells the clothes door to door or takes orders from her customers in advance. She works three to four days a week and about four hours a day. She goes to buy her merchandise in Guayaquil, where she visits one or two times a month depending on her sales or the orders she has. She sells on credit and collects the money every week. She has had this business for 10 years and it is going very well for her.

She will use this loan to buy all kinds of clothes since at the moment she has some orders. She is a founding member of the communal bank and she likes it because it is easy to take out loans and make payments.

Her dream is to have a premises for her business.

loans.use: to buy clothes.

loans.name: Mirian Janett

texts.es:
La socia nació en la provincia del Cusco y vive en la ciudad del Cusco, ella tiene 41 años de edad es conviviente y fruto de esta hermosa relación tiene dos hijos, ella pertenece al banco comunal “Santa Rosita de Lima” de la Asociación Arariwa.

Su actividad económica principal es la venta de tarjetas telefónicas. Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar más tarjetas. Agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
This group member was born in the province of Cusco and lives in the city of Cusco.  She is 41 years old and lives with her partner, with whom she has two beautiful children.  She belongs to the communal bank "Santa Rosita de Lima" of the Arariwa Association.

Her main economic activity is the selling of telephone cards.  She has been doing this work for several years and it is going very well.  At this time she needs a loan in order to purchase more phone cards.  She is thankful to everyone who forms part of this dream through Kiva's website and she promises to comply with the repayment of her loan based on the established timetable.

loans.use: To purchase more phone cards.

loans.name: María Celinda

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Portoviejo, capital de Manabí conocida desde hace muchos años  como la ciudad de los reales tamarindos, se reúnen cada quince días  las socias del Banco Comunal Pequeños Comerciantes.

En este lugar vive la señora María, tiene 46 años de edad, está casada y fruto de esta relación tienen 7 hijos, 5 de los cuales ya son mayores de edad y los menores tienen 17 y 15 años y estudian en el colegio. El esposo  se dedica al comercio.

Doña María tiene un pequeño restaurante en su casa en el cual prepara deliciosos platos que son el deleite de sus clientes quienes a diario acuden hasta su local para servirse la comida que ella prepara, además de comida también vende batidos de frutas y otros productos elaborados. Trabaja todos los días en las tardes, desde las 6  hasta las 8 de la noche  o hasta que se termine lo que se preparo. Trabaja con la ayuda de sus hijos menores los cuales después de hacer sus tareas le ayudan en lo necesario para dar una buena atención a los clientes, lleva más de 10 años con este negocio el cual les ayuda mucho a solventar los gastos de sus hijos y del hogar.

Este crédito lo va a utilizar para comprar víveres para la preparación de los alimentos y frutas. Está en el Banco Comunal desde hace más de 6 años y le gusta por ayuda que le dan con los créditos.
 
Su sueño es seguir mejorando su restaurante
texts.en:
The members of the "Pequeños Comerciantes" ("Small Retailers") communal bank gather together every 15 days in the town of Portoviejo, capital of Manabí. It has been known for several years as the city of the royal tamarind trees.
There lives María. She's 46 years old and married, and from this relationship she has seven children. The youngest ones are 17 and 15 years old and attend high school. Her husband is in retail.
María runs a small restaurant in her house. She prepares delicious dishes that delight her customers, who come to her eatery every day in order to help themselves to the food she cooks. Aside from meals, she also sells fruit smoothies and other prepared foodstuffs. She works in the afternoons every day from 6 p.m. to 8 p.m., or until everything she prepared is finished. She gets help from her youngest children; after they're done with homework, they provide the help she needs in other to serve her customers well. She has been in this business for over 10 years and it very much helps her to pay for her children's and her household's expenses.
She'll use this loan to purchase provisions for preparing food, and also fruits. She has been a member of the communal bank for over 6 years and she likes it because of the help she gets with the loans.
Her dream is to keep on improving her restaurant.

loans.use: to purchase provisions and fruits.

loans.name: Manuel Alberto

texts.es:
El socio nació en la ciudad del Cusco y vive en la misma ciudad donde nació, él tiene 47 años de edad es separado pero tiene un hijo, él pertenece al banco comunal “Santa Rosita de Lima” de la Asociación Arariwa.

Su actividad económica principal trabajar para una empresa privada pero su actividad complementaria es la venta de productos energéticos. Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para hacer mantenimiento de la casa pues va refaccionar el techo pues se están acercando la época de lluvias. Agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Manuel Alberto was born in the city of Cusco and still lives there now. He is 47 years old and is separated, but he has a son. He belongs to the "Santa Rosita de Lima" communal bank of the Asociación Arariwa.

His main source of income comes from working for a private company, but he also sells energy products. He has been doing this for several years now and it is going very well for him.

In this opportunity he is asking for the loan so that he can carry out maintenance on his house and then repair his roof, as the rainy season is getting closer. He is grateful to those who are part of his dream through these loans and he is committed to making his repayments on time.

loans.use: to carry out maintenance on his house and repair his roof.

loans.name: Yolita Yenny

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Portoviejo, capital de Manabí conocida desde hace muchos años  como la ciudad de los reales tamarindos, se reúnen cada quince días  las socias del Banco Comunal Pequeños Comerciantes.

En este lugar vive la  señora Yolita, tiene 47 años de edad, hace varios años su querido esposo falleció y no tuvo hijos, ella  vive con dos hermanos que son su compañía.

Doña Yolita tiene una pequeña tienda en su casa, allí vende desde productos de primera necesidad hasta ciertos productos de bazar y papelería, ella se dedica en cuerpo y alma a su negocio ya que es su distracción y su forma de ganarse el sustento diario. Trabaja todos los días desde las 6h00 hasta las 20h00.  Lleva más de 10 años con este negocio el cual lo tenían con su difunto esposo.

Este crédito lo va a emplear en surtir más su tienda con mayor variedad de productos de primera necesidad, artículos de bazar y ciertos útiles escolares. Lleva ya más de 5 años en el Banco Comunal y siempre le han ayudado mucho los créditos.

Sus metas son seguir adelante en su negocio y que su tienda crezca cada día más.
texts.en:
The capital of Manabí is Portoviejo, a city that has also been known for many years as 'The City of the Royal Tamarind Trees'. In Portoviejo, members of Banco Comunal Pequeños Comerciantes (Small Business-holders Communal Bank) meet every fortnight.  

Yolita, who is 47 years old, lives there. A few years ago her dear husband died and she didn't have any children. She lives with her two brothers who provide her with company.

Yolita has a small shop in her house where she sells everyday items including certain stationary products. She pours all her energy into her business as it keeps her distracted and is the way she provides for herself. She works everyday from 6am to 8pm. She has been working in this business, which she had with her late husband, for more than ten years.  

She is going to use this loan to stock her shop with a greater variety of everyday products, stationary and school supplies. She has been a member of the communal bank for 5 years and the loans have always been a big help to her. 

Her aims are to improve her business and see her shop continue to grow.

loans.use: to buy everyday items, stationary and school supplies.

loans.name: Gary Mirko

texts.es:
El socio nació en la ciudad del Cusco y vive en la misma ciudad donde nació, él tiene 42 años de edad es casado y fruto de esta hermosa relación tiene dos hijos, él pertenece al banco comunal “Santa Rosita de Lima” de la Asociación Arariwa.

Su actividad económica principal trabajar para una empresa privada pero su actividad complementaria es la venta de tarjetas telefónicas. Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar más tarjetas telefónicas. Agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Gary lives in the city of Cusco and lives in the same city in which he was born.  He is 42 years old, he is married, and he has two children.  He is a member of the community bank “Santa Rosita de Lima” in the Arariwa association.

He works for a private company, but to make ends meet he also sells telephone cards.  For many years he has sold these cards and it has gone well.  He needs a loan in order to buy more telephone cards.  He is thankful to everyone that is a part of making this dream come true and he promises to comply with the established payment schedule.

loans.use: to sell telephone cards.

loans.name: Maria Angela

texts.es:
La socia nació en la provincia del Cusco y vive en la ciudad del Cusco, ella tiene 25 años de edad es soltera y no tienes hijos aun, ella pertenece al banco comunal “Santa Rosita de Lima” de la Asociación Arariwa.

Su actividad económica principal es barman en una empresa privada pero su actividad económica complementaria es realizar eventos como 15 años, bautizos, matrimonios y otros compromisos sociales. Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para pagar sus estudios pues está estudiando la carrera profesional de turismo. Agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
This group member was born in the province of Cusco and lives in the city of Cusco.  She is 25 years old and is single and does not have children yet.  She belongs to the communal bank "Santa Rosita de Lima" of the Arariwa Association.

Her main economic activity is running a private business, but her complementary economic activity is event planning for events like quinciañeras (15th Birthday celebrations), baptisms, weddings, and other social gatherings.  She has been working in this field for several years and it is going well.  At this time she needs a loan in order to pay for her studies since she is studying to get a degree in Hospitality and Tourism.  She is thankful to those who form part of this dream via Kiva and she promises to comply with the repayment of her loan according to the established timetable.

loans.use: to pay for her studies since she is studying to get a degree in Hospitality and Tourism.

loans.name: Isidro

texts.es:
El socio nació en la provincia de Chumvibilca pero vive en la hermosa ciudad del Cusco, él tiene 46 años de edad es conviviente y fruto de esta hermosa relación tiene tres hijos, él pertenece al banco comunal “Santa Rosita de Lima” de la Asociación Arariwa.

Su actividad económica principal es brindar servicio de taxi urbano. Ya son varios años que se dedica a este actividad y le muy bien. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para hacer mantenimiento del carro o sea va hacer cambiar el aceite del carro. Agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Isidro was born in the province of Chumvibilca but lives in the beautiful city of Cusco.  He is 46 years old and he is married with three children.  He belongs to the community bank “Santa Rosita de Lima” in the Arariwa Association.

His primary job is to provide an urban taxi service.  For many years he has done this work and it has gone well.  Now he needs a loan so that he can perform maintenance on his taxi and to change the oil.  He is thankful to everyone that is a part of making this happen and he promises to comply with the established payment schedule.

loans.use: to perform maintenance on his car.

loans.name: Rodelyn

texts.en:
At 21, Rodelyn is already married with two children who are both infants. Due to her early marriage, she was not able to finish college so she is with her husband who manages a farm to make a living. To support him in generating income, Rodelyn is engaged in a buy-and-sell business which includes frozen foods and cosmetics like lotions and fragrances. 

Rodelyn has been operating this business for two years and is earning PHP 8,000 each month which is used to support their everyday living. To expand the business further, she is requesting additional capital of PHP 7,000 to  buy larger amounts of frozen foods like pork sausages and cosmetics such as lotions and fragrances to sell. 

Rodelyn promises to spend the loan wisely towards her business success to support her children's future.

loans.use: To buy frozen foods and cosmetics to sell.

loans.name: Rim's Group

texts.en:
Rim is 25 years of age and married. She lives in a rural village in Moung Russey district in Battambang province in Cambodia.  She is blessed with one daughter and one son, both of whom are too young for school and still her responsibility. To offer a decent life for her family, Rim has a business farming rice which enables her to earn around 23,000 KHR per day. 

Rim has been with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner) for three loan cycles already with which she has accomplished improvements to her family’s lifestyle. Now she is in need of money to purchase fertilizer and pesticide, and to cover the cost of labor. Thus, she is leading a loan group of three female members to apply for a loan of 3,800,000 KHR in total. After receiving her requested loan portion and using it wisely, Rim believes that her business will provide a good quality crop so that she can sell it for more profit. She hopes that she can save up some money in order to send her children to a good school in the future.

loans.use: To purchase fertilizer and pesticide and to pay labor costs

loans.name: Letecia

texts.en:
Letecia is 41 years old and is married but was not blessed with a child. Despite this, she maintains a good family relationship. Letecia and her husband are aiming for a happy and successful life having their own house in which to live more comfortably and a viable business to manage. In order to achieve their goals, they help each other in generating income. 

Letecia engages in buying and selling fish in their community while her husband cultivates their farmland by planting corn and vegetables for sale. She planned to improve her business to increase her income but, due to insufficient capital, she is asking for a loan of PHP 20,000 to buy more stocks of fish to sell. Letecia believes that her loan will enable her to improve the business and is hoping that she will become successful in the future.

loans.use: to buy more stocks of fish to sell

location.town: Brgy. Sta. Cruz, Bagabag, Nueva Vizcaya

loans.name: Sam Boeurn

texts.en:
Sam Boeurn is 43 years old. She is married and lives with her three children in Battambang Province, Cambodia. She has been running a sewing shop and selling grilled sticky rice cake for more than three years, earning approximately $3 daily. Her husband is a farmer. In addition, he runs a business purchasing fruits to resell. He earns about $11 each day. 

Due to the difficulties in her family’s transportation needs, Sam Boeurn has requested a loan of $400 to purchase a motorbike for commuting. This purchase will help her to reduce their transportation expenses. In the future, she would like to expand her business and help her children access higher education. Moreover, Sam Boeurn hopes to rebuild her house to make it more comfortable for her family.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike for commuting

loans.name: Soliga

texts.en: Soliga is a 63 -year-old married woman with four children. She would like to start growing a taro plantation to earn a living. Soliga has requested a loan to buy taro crops, weed spray, fertilizers, etc. She has been a member of SPBD for five years. Soliga  will spend her profits on improving and extending her business.

loans.use: to buy taro crops, weed spray, fertilizers, etc.

loans.name: Ret

texts.en:
Ret is 30 years old. He is married and lives with his mother and his child in Battambang Province, Cambodia. He has been running a business making jars and ground gutters to sell for more than 10 years, earning approximately $16 daily. His wife is involved in breeding pigs to sell. She earns about $5 each day. 

In order to improve his business, Ret has requested a loan of $1000 to purchase cement and sand to use in producing more jars and to buy sewage to sell. This money will help him generate more income for his family. In the future, Ret would like to expand his business and send his child to a good school. Also, he hopes to build a new house as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase cement and sand for producing more jars and to buy sewage to sell

loans.name: Norma

texts.en:
Norma is 55 years of age and is widowed. She has seven children. Norma rears pigs in the Philippines and has been doing this for almost five years. She earns PHP 4,000 per piglet. She is asking for a loan of PHP 17,000 to purchase additional piglets to raise and to buy feed for them. 

In the future, Norma hopes to improve this business so she can increase her income to support her children's needs. She is thankful that Kiva lenders offer financial assistance for her to strengthen her business. She hopes that she will continuously receive advice in her business to make it more viable and profitable.

loans.use: to purchase additional piglets to raise and to buy feed for them

loans.name: Amoniddin

texts.ru: Амониддин мужчина  1972 года рождения.   Он женат и имеет четверых детей.   Обратился в Арванд  чтобы получить кредит так как хочет купить скот и корм для  скота.   Сам он по профессии  ветеринар.   Жена Амониддина работает преподавателем  в школе своего села и в свободное от работы время помогает мужу откармливать скот.   Амониддин имеет многолетний опыт в разведении скота.  С Арвандом сотрудничает с 2011 года.  Он очень пунктуальный и никогда не нарушал условия кредитования.  Амониддин хочет развивать свой бизнес так как этот бизнес дает хороший доход.  На полученный кредит он планирует купить скот и корм для скота. Заранее благодарит Арванд за финансовую поддержку.
texts.en:
Amoniddin is a man who was born in 1972. He is married and has four children. He turned to Arvand in order to get a loan as he would like to purchase livestock and livestock feed. He is a veterinary by profession. Amoniddin's wife works as a teacher  at the school in their village and when she is off work she helps her husband to fatten livestock. 

Amoniddin has many years of experience in breeding livestock. He has worked with Arvand since 2011. He is very punctual and has never broken the loan terms. Amoniddin would like to develop his business so that this business gives a good income. For the loan received he plans to purchase livestock and livestock feed. He thanks Arvand in advance for the financial support.

loans.use: to purchase livestock and livestock feed

loans.name: Miraj

texts.en:
Ms Miraj is a 46-year-old married woman. She has two cows and has produced milk for many years. She started her business by selling goats and sheep at the festival of Eid-ul-Azha, and gradually purchased cows to begin her business of selling milk.  Miraj sells her milk to many of her neighbors, along with butter, cheese and ghee that she makes from the milk. She has a good client list and her business is good enough for her to lead a decent life.

Miraj is a mother of eight; two daughters and six sons. Her sons also help in her business, while her husband works at a government job.  She is in her sixth loan cycle and has a strong association with the Kashf Foundation. She has taken several loans and each time paid back her loan in full and on time. Now she requests a loan of 50,000 PKR to buy another cow to increase milk production and serve more people in her community. She wishes to utilize part of her revenue for her children's education.

loans.use: To buy a cow to increase milk production.

loans.name: Zanib

texts.en:
Ms Zanib is a 43-year-old married woman. She has sold milk for 12 years with the support of her husband, also shown in the photo. They have four adult buffalo and two baby buffalo. Every morning Zanib milks her buffalo and prepares the liters of milk for her husband who takes it to the market to sell. They have a good client list and business is good enough to lead a decent life. 

Zanib is a mother of eight; one daughter and seven sons. Her sons also help in her business.  She is in her sixth loan cycle and has a strong association with Kashf Foundation. She has taken several loans and each time paid back her loan in full and on time. Now she requests a loan of 40,000 PKR to buy one more buffalo to increase milk production and serve more people in her community. She wishes to utilize part of her revenue for her children's education and for them to have a career in the armed forces.

loans.use: To buy a buffalo to increase milk production.

loans.name: Yolanda

texts.en:
Yolanda is a 49-year-old mother of three who owns and manages a small variety store in her village. Her goal is to improve her business and help her husband pay for their children’s education. They want their children to earn degrees and become professionals someday. Despite the hardships in life, they have the determination to improve their business and continue to send their children to school. 

Yolanda is asking for a loan of 10,000 PHP to buy soft drinks, shampoo, detergent, snack food, beverages, canned goods, candies, biscuits and seasonings to sell in her store. She believes that through patience and hard work the business will improve and become more viable in the future.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks, shampoo, detergents, snack food, beverages, canned goods, candies, biscuits and seasonings to sell.

loans.name: Alexander

texts.en: Alexander is 50 years of age, married, and has two siblings. He is aiming for a successful life in order to give his family a better life. He has been a farmer for almost 33 years, planting rice and vegetables to sell. Due to the high cost of commodities and school fees, he also engages in a hog-raising business to generate additional income. He planned to raise more pigs to sell but he doesn't have enough capital. Therefore, he is asking for an additional PHP 36,000 to buy more piglets, feed and vitamins needed in hog raising. Despite problems and difficulties in life, he has the determination to improve the business and make it a viable source of income. He is hoping that someday he will become financially stable and successful in life.

loans.use: to buy additional piglets, feed and vitamins needed in hog raising

loans.name: Antonieta

texts.en: Antonieta is a 49-year-old, single woman living in Centro 1, Angadanan. Antonieta has been in the business of motorcycle transport services for three years and she earns approximately PHP 300 daily. Right now, she is requesting a loan of PHP 12,000 to pay for her license and for the repair of her motorcycle for better service. In the future, Antonieta would like to have good financial management.

loans.use: to pay for her license and to repair her motorcycle

loans.name: Marites

texts.en: Marites is 47 years old and widowed. She lives in a rural community with her two children. Despite the hardship of living, Marites aims to become financially stable so that she can provide her family's needs and support the education of her children. Due to the high cost of commodities and school fees, she is engaged in the hog-raising business to generate additional income. She planned to strengthen this business to generate sufficient income.  Due to inadequate capital, she is asking for an additional of PHP 30,000 to buy feeds, vitamins and vaccines needed in hog raising. Through this financial assistance, she believes that she will make an improvement in the business and she hopes that she will become successful in the future.

loans.use: to buy feed, vitamins and vaccines for her hogs

location.town: Brgy. Sta. Cruz, Bagabag, Nueva Vizcaya

loans.name: Saleeman

texts.en: Ms. Saleeman is a 33-year-old married woman and a mother of three. For the past 11 years, Saleeman has been running a business of milk sales with the support of her husband. The man shown in the photo is Saleeman’s husband. Every morning she milks her buffaloes and prepares liters of milk while her husband assists her in selling it door-to-door in her community.  She helps her husband in all family matters as well as financial matters. She wants to build a new home with the revenue from her business. She has been in association with Kashf for five years and has shown excellent repayment behavior. She has some savings and has applied for a loan of PKR 40,000 to purchase another buffalo. She expects a boost in her business income as she expands her business. Her husband respects her a lot and is very happy with her contribution to the family income.
