Mme vend des céréales  depuis 12ans.  Elle s’approvisionne au marché de son secteur. Ses clients sont les hommes et les femmes.
Elle veut s’acheter  01 sac d’haricot et 50 plats d’arachide.
Elle  veut mieux s’occuper de sa famille avec ses bénéfices. Mme  ambitionne agrandir son commerce et  s’acheter un motocycle.
texts.en:
Rasmata is the representative of the YASS MALGRE group.  She is married and the mother of three children who all attend school.  Her oldest child is 13, the youngest is 6 years old.  She has three people in her care.

Rasmata has been selling grains for the past 12 years.  She stocks up at her local district's market and sells to both men and women.

She wants to buy one bag of beans and 50 bowls of groundnuts.

She wants to use her profits to take better care of her family.  Her ambition is to expand her business and to buy a motorcycle.

loans.use: to buy one bag of beans and 50 bowls of groundnuts.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy two bags of beans.

loans.name: Malkia Group

texts.en:
HALFAN, who is in his early 30's, is married and has three children, who are in school.  For a year and a half now he has been earning a living by running a bodaboda (motorcycle transport) business. He works from 5am to 10pm daily, and he is able to make a good monthly profit.

This will be his first loan from Tujijenge Tanzania.  He wants to increase his stock in his genge (grocery stall), as well as renovate the business place. His dream is to one day be able to build a house.

He will share this loan with his loan group "MALKIA", which totals 14 members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to increase genge (grocery) stock as well as renovate the business place.

loans.name: Adeela

texts.en: Ms Adeela is a 31-year-old married woman and a mother of one. She had a difficult time after her husband's business failure. She decided to work with her husband and to support her family for a better future. Two years ago she began stitching work in her house. She stitches for the people living around her house and uses the income to support her entire family. However, due to lack of availability of funds she is unable to meet the daily demands of her customers. She is currently in her first loan cycle and has borrowed Rs 10,000 from Kashf. She intends to use this loan amount to buy raw material including cloth, threads of different colors, laces, zips, etc., to create a means of increasing revenues so she may be able to generate a healthier source of income. She dreams to provide good and quality education to her children through all her hard slog.

loans.use: To buy raw material including cloth, threads of different colors, laces, zippers etc.

loans.name: Maria

texts.pt:
Casada e mãe de 1 filho que já frequenta Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém.
É professora e do quadro do Ministério da Educação e com este empréstimo pretende comprar roupas e acessórios de beleza para revender. 
No futuro deseja aumentar a capacidade do seu negócio para poder responder a demanda da sua clientela e aumentar a sua receita, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é conseguir um meio de transporte para a sua mercadoria.
texts.en: Maria is married and is the mother of one son who goes to school.  She lives in her own home with her family and doesn't support anyone else besides them.  She works as a teacher as part of the Ministry of Education.  She will use this loan to buy clothing and beauty accessories to resell.  In the future, she hopes to increase the capacity of her business to be able to respond to her customers' demands and to increase her income.  To do this, she promises to make her payments on time so she can request more loans from Hluvuku.  Her challenge is obtaining a method of transportation for her merchandise.

loans.use: to buy and sell clothing.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy 16 meters of fabric and 5 boards of buttons

loans.name: René

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 2 filhos já frequentam Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém.
É militar e quadro do Ministério da Defesa e com este empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (ferro, pedra, cimento, areia, blocos e outros) para dar continuidade com a ampliação da sua casa. 
No futuro deseja tirar carta de condução para trabalhar como motorista civil, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é terminar a sua obra e mudar de carreira profissional.
texts.en: René is the father of two children who go to school.  He lives in his own home with his family and doesn't support anyone besides them.  He is in the military and is part of the Ministry of Defense.  He will use this loan to buy construction materials (iron, stone, cement, sand, blocks, etc.) to continue adding onto his home.  In the future, he hopes to get his driver's license so he can work as a driver.  To do this, he promises to make his payments on time so he can request more loans from Hluvuku.  His goals are to finish his home and to change professional careers.

loans.use: to buy construction materials (iron, stone, cement, sand, blocks, etc.) to continue adding onto his house.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to open a second  place for clothes business.

loans.name: Delfina

texts.pt:
Casada e tem folhos já maiores de idade, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta 3 netos que vivem com ela.
É Professora e quadro do Ministério da Educação. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (arame, pedra, cimento, areia, ferro e outros) para ampliar a sua casa. 
No futuro deseja concluir a sua obra e oferecer melhor conforto a sua família, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é conseguir manter-se saudável para poder cumprir com as suas actividades diárias.
texts.en: Delfina is married and has children who are now already adults.  She lives in her own home with her family and also supports three grandchildren that live with her.  She is a teacher and works for the Ministry of Education.  She will use this loan to buy construction materials (wire, stone, cement, sand, iron, etc.) to add onto her house.  In the future, she hopes to finish her house to offer more comfort to her family.  To do this, she promises to make her payments on time so she can request more loans from Hluvuku.  Her challenge is staying healthy to be able to do her daily activities.

loans.use: to buy construction materials (wire, stone, cement, sand, iron, etc.) to add onto her house.

loans.name: Soom Be Wende Group

texts.fr:
Mme T. Celine est responsable du  groupe SOOM BE WENDE. Mariée, elle est mère de cinq (05) enfants. Le plus âgé a 17ans et le moins âgés à 03 ans. Quatre (04) vont  à l’école et elle a 05 personnes  en charge.
Mme fait la restauration depuis 10ans.  Elle s’approvisionne aux  marchés  de son secteur. Ses clients sont les hommes, les femmes et les enfants.
Elle veut s’acheter  03 sacs d’haricot et 01 sac de riz.
Elle  veut épargner ses bénéfices dans un compte pour s’acheter une moto. Mme  ambitionne agrandir son activités et aider son mari à s’occuper de sa famille.
texts.en:
T. Celine is the representative of the SOOM BE WENDE group.  She is married and has five children, four of whom go to school. Her oldest child is 17 years old, the youngest is 3.  She has five people in her care.

T. Celine has been preparing and serving meals for ten years.  She stocks up at local markets in her district and sells to men, women and children.  She wants to buy three bags of beans and one bag of rice.

She plans to save her profits and to have a savings account, so that she can buy a motorcycle.  Her ambition is to expand her business and to help her husband take care of the family.

loans.use: to buy three bags of beans and one bag of rice.

loans.name: Rui

texts.pt:
Solteiro e pai de 1 filho que já frequenta Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém.
Trabalha como técnico administrativo numa das instituições do Estado. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (cimento, areia, ferro, arame, blocos e outros) para dar continuidade com ampliação da sua casa. 
No futuro espera melhorar o seu nível de vida buscando outras fontes de aumento da receita, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é terminar a sua obra e conseguir constituir uma família oficialmente.
texts.en: Rui is unmarried and is the father of one son who goes to school.  He lives in his own home with his family and doesn't support anyone else besides them.  He works as an administrative technician in one of the state's institutions.  He will use this loan to buy construction materials (cement, sand, iron, wire, blocks, etc.) to continue adding onto his home.  In the future, he hopes to improve his quality of life and to look for other sources of income.  To do this, he promises to make his payments on time so he can request more loans from Hluvuku.  His goal is to finish his home and to be able to form a family officially.

loans.use: to buy construction materials (cement, sand, iron, wire, blocks, etc.) to continue adding onto his home.

loans.name: Domingos

texts.pt:
Casado e tem filhos que já frequentam Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém.
Trabalha como polícia de protecção e é do quadro do Ministério do Interior. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (porta, cimento, areia, ferro, arame, blocos e outros) para dar continuidade com melhoria da sua casa. 
No futuro espera subir de categoria na sua função iniciar outras actividades para o aumento da receita, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é conseguir iniciar uma actividade que possa aumentar a sua renda mensal para cobrir as suas necessidades.
texts.en: Domingos is married and has children who are in school.  He lives in his own house with his family and doesn't support anyone else besides them.  He works as a police officer as part of the Ministry of the Interior.  He will use this loan to buy construction materials (a door, cement, sand, iron, wire, blocks, etc.) to continue improving his house.  In the future, he hopes to advance at work and to start other activities to increase his income.  To do this, he promises to make his payments on time so he can request more loans from Hluvuku.  His challenge is starting a business that can increase his monthly income to cover all of his needs.

loans.use: to buy construction materials (a door, cement, sand, iron, wire, blocks, etc.) to continue improving his house.

loans.name: Feleciano

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 6 filhos, outros ainda frequentam Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém.
Trabalha como guarda numa instituição pública e tem um negócio de venda de produtos diversos. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (arroz, farinha, feijão, óleo, caldo, peixe e outros) para aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria e satisfazer a sua clientela. 
No futuro deseja ter um tractor para poder trabalhar a terra, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é o elevado custo de vida e o salário muito baixo.
texts.en: Feleciano is marrid and is the father of six children, some of whom are still in school.  He lives in his own home with his family and doesn't support anyone else besides them.  He works as a guard at a public institution and also has a business selling various products.  He will use this loan to buy rice, flour, beans, oil, soup, fish, etc., to increase his quantity of merchandise and to satisfy his customers.  In the future, he hopes to have a tractor to be able to work the land.  To do this, he promises to make his payments on time so he can request more loans from Hluvuku.  His challenges are the elevated cost of living and his very low wages.

loans.use: to buy and sell rice, flour, beans, oil, soup, fish, etc.

loans.name: Ana

texts.pt:
Solteira e mãe de 2 filhos que frequentam Escola, vive na dos pais com os seus filhos e não sustenta mais ninguém.
É técnica de Administração Publica numa instituição do Estado e com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar uma geleira para o uso familiar. 
No futuro deseja ter uma casa própria e garantir o bem-estar de seus filhos, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é poder ter um transporte pessoal e concluir a sua formação académica.
texts.en: Ana is single and is the mother of two children who go to school.  She lives with her parents and her children and doesn't support anyone else.  She is a public administration technician in one of the state's institutions.  She will use this loan to buy a refrigerator for her family's use.  In the future, she hopes to have her own house to guarantee the well-being of her children.  To do this, she promises to make her payments on time so she can request more loans from Hluvuku.  Her goal is being able to have personal transportation to be able to finish her academic studies.

loans.use: to buy a refrigerator for her family's use.

loans.name: Adriana

texts.pt:
Solteira e sem filhos ainda, vive na casa dos pais e não sustenta mais ninguém.
É comerciante vende produtos diverso e com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (açúcar, óleo, massas, arroz, frangos e outros) para poder melhorar a quantidade e qualidade de seu produto. 
No futuro deseja aumentar ainda mais a quantidade de produtos na sua banca, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é falta de transporte para poder escoar o seu produto para os locais de revende.
texts.en: Adriana is single and doesn't have kids yet.  She lives in her parents' house and doesn't support anyone else.  She sells various products and will use this loan to buy more products like sugar, oil, pasta, rice, chicken, etc. to be able to improve the quantity and quality of her merchandise.  In the future, she hopes to increase her quantity of products even more.  To do this, she promises to make her payments on time so she can request more loans from Hluvuku.  Her challenge is the lack of transportation to be able to take her products to resale locations.

loans.use: to buy and sell sugar, oil, pasta, rice, chicken, etc.

loans.name: Marçal

texts.pt:
Casado e tem filhos que já frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém.
É motorista de camiões de longo percurso e com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar electrodomésticos (ferro de engomar, chaleira eléctrica fogão e outros) para melhorar as condições de vida da sua família. 
No futuro deseja terminar a ampliação da sua casa e adquirir uma própria viatura, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é o tipo de trabalho que exerce que não facilita estar ao lado da família na maioria do tempo e a própria avaria da viatura.
texts.en: Marçal is married and has children that are in school.  He lives in his own home with his family and doesn't support anyone besides them.  He is a long distance truck driver.  He will use this loan to buy household appliances (an iron, a tea kettle, a stove, etc.) to improve his family's living conditions.  In the future, he hopes to finish adding onto his house and to acquire his own vehicle.  To do this, he promises to make his payments on time so he can request more loans from Hluvuku.  His challenge is that his line of work makes it difficult to be with his family most of the time and that sometimes his truck breaks down.

loans.use: to buy household appliances (an iron, a tea kettle, a stove, etc.)

loans.name: Musarrat

texts.en:
Ms. Musarrat is a 26-year-old married woman.  She helps her husband to run a grocery store located outside of their home.  When the couple started their relation with Kashf five years ago, their store was small with very few items.  They wanted to increase the range of products but the lack of funds made this almost impossible.  Mussarat borrowed some funds from Kashf in anticipation of business improvement.  Over time, they have added new items to the store and it has become popular in the community.  They want to increase their inventory since the population of their neighborhood has increased in recent years.  Currently they have applied for a loan of 30,000 (PKR) which they will use to add new racks (for increased storage capacity) and to purchase stocks of rice and sugar.  

Prior to the relation with Kashf, none of Ms. Musarrat’s four children went to school.  Now, the youngest daughter is the first child of the family to receive formal education.  The family is living a much better life than before because they are able to meet their expenses easily and to maintain a good standard of living.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, and new racks for increased storage capacity.

loans.name: Al-Hlal Al-Ahmer Group

texts.en:
This group is called Al-Hlal Al-Ahmer and is made up of four women  who live in Sana`a, Yemen. They took out a loan of 140,000 YER from AMB.

Hamamh is a 40-year-old married woman with nine children. They live in Sana`a, Yemen. She is working hard to cover her family`s expenses. She is requesting a loan of 50,000 YER from AMB to buy construction supplies for her home. She hopes to build a second floor for her house.

loans.use: to buy construction supplies for her home.

loans.name: Bhawani Shankar Group

texts.en:
In the year 2010 Bhawani Shankar, a Joint Liability Group, was formed by four women of Bhawanipatna town of Kalahandi district in Odisha, India with an objective to add some extra income to their family by taking out a loan from Mahashakti Foundation. Babita is one of them. The lady standing second from left with yellow sari is Babita. She is 38 years of age, and is a straightforward, confident and hardworking lady, living with her husband, one son aged 15, and two daughters aged 17 and 12 who are studying in college.

Babita is running a dairy farm with 15 cows. Her husband helps her in nurturing the cows and the milk supply. The primary work of Babita is to clean the cow shed every morning and keep the shed clean. Babita gets 20 liters of milk daily and supplies it to a sweet stall in her town. She gets payment from the stall owner on weekly basis. Babita earns a monthly net income of 6000 Indian Rupees (INR) but it is not sufficient to manage her household expenses along with the educational expenses of her children. Therefore to earn some extra income Babita has planned to utilize the present loan for purchasing another two cows of an improved variety. Babita has a dream to save some money for the marriage of her daughters and to construct a house.

The other three members Ratnamala, Bindu and Sabita are selling dry food at wholesale, an auto repair and servicing center, and a tailoring center. Since inception Babita has been managing her group with utmost sincerity and earned a very good repute in her locality.

loans.use: To purchase cows.

loans.name: Al-Tam Group

texts.en:
This group is called Al-Tam and consists of four women who live in Sana`a, Yemen.

Sabah is a 42-year-old married woman who has nine children. She lives in Sana`a, Yemen. She owns a house and works from home to provide home improvements but she doesn't have enough money. She is requesting a loan of 40,000 YER from AMB to buy construction supplies. Her dream for her children is to improve their living standards.

loans.use: to buy construction supplies for her house.

loans.name: Khiriah Group

texts.en:
This group is called Khiriah and consists of three women who live in Taiz, Yemen. They are hardworking and applied for a loan of 110,000 YER.

Khiriah is 38 years old and lives in Taiz, Yemen. She owns a house and would like to complete the building.  She has applied for a loan of 50,000 YER from AMB to buy construction supplies for her home.

loans.use: to buy construction supplies for her home.

loans.name: Al-Ghnass Group

texts.en:
This group is called Al-Ghnass, and consists of six women who live in Taiz, Yemen. They applied for a loan of 120,000 YER from AMB.

Lina is 53 years old and lives with her family in Taiz, Yemen.  She sells sheep. Lina is experienced in sales, which allows her to make a better income. She started with two sheep. She works hard to offer a good life for her family. She is a resourceful and honest woman dedicated to her work. She applied for a loan of 20,000 YER from AMB to buy sheep for resale. She hopes to own a retail shop

loans.use: to buy sheep for resale.

loans.name: Rina

texts.es: La socia continúa en uno de los bancos comunales de la Asociación Arariwa y con la venta de cosméticos y elaboración de manualidades. Ella es una persona responsable y amable que saca adelante a su familia. Solicita el préstamo para comprar materiales como tela, hilos, agujas y otras cosas más. Está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: Rina continues to participate in one of Asociación Arariwa's communal banks and she is still selling cosmetics and making crafts. She is a responsible and kind person who works to get her family ahead. She is requesting a loan to buy materials like fabric, thread, needles and other items. She is happy to receive this loan and promises to comply with the repayment terms.

loans.use: to buy materials like fabric, thread and needles

loans.name: Yaneth

texts.es: La socia continúa en uno de los bancos comunales de la Asociación Arariwa y con la elaboración de manualidades (Muñecas y servilletas). Ella es una persona responsable y amable que saca adelante a su familia. Solicita el préstamo para comprar materiales como tela, hilos, agujas y otras cosas más. Está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member still belongs to one of Asociación Arariwa's communal banks. She continues to make crafts (dolls and napkins). She is a responsible and kind person who provides for her family. 

She is requesting this loan to purchase materials like fabric, thread, needles, and other items. She is happy with the loan and promises to pay her installments.

loans.use: to purchase materials such as fabric, thread, and needles.

loans.name: Josefa De Jesús

texts.es:
La Señora Josefa de Jesús, tiene un negocio de venta de productos populares o de primera necesidad ubicado en unos de los mercados  del departamento de León desde hace 24 años, sale de su casa a las 4:30 am y abre su negocio a las 5:00 am cerrándolo a 5 pm. es madre de cuatro hijos, realiza este trabajo para ayudar a su esposo con el sustento de la familia. 

Josefa de Jesús,  utilizara este crédito para comprar pasas, alcaparra, salsas, ajo, plátanos, quequisque, papa, cebolla pepino, lechuga, arroz, frijoles, azúcar, aceite y jabón, ya que estos productos lo están demandando  sus clientes debido a que se aproxima la navidad.

Josefa de Jesús,  ha incrementado  su inventario con los préstamos que ha financiado Ceprodel, ella sueña que su hija logre a coronar su carrera y terminar de mejorar su vivienda.
texts.en:
For 24 years, Josefa de Jesús has had a business selling popular products and staple goods. Her business is located in one of the markets in León department. She leaves her house at 4:30 AM and opens her business at 5:00 AM, closing at 5:00 PM. She is the mother of four children. She performs this work in order to help her husband sustain their family. 

Josefa de Jesús will use this loan to buy raisins, capers, sauces, garlic, bananas, taro, potatoes, onion, cucumber, lettuce, rice, beans, sugar, oil and soap, as these are the products that her customers are demanding as Christmas approaches. 

Josefa de Jesús has increased her inventory with the loans she has received through CEPRODEL. She dreams that her daughter will have a good career and of finishing her house.

loans.use: to buy raisins, capers, sauces, garlic, bananas, taro, potatoes, onion, cucumber, lettuce, rice, beans, sugar, oil and soap

loans.name: Yolanda

texts.es: La socia continúa en uno de los bancos comunales de la Asociación Arariwa y con la siembre y cosecha de café. Ella es una persona responsable y amable que saca adelante a su familia. Solicita el préstamo para comprar fertilizantes y semillas. Está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: Yolanda continues to participate in one of Asociación Arariwa's communal banks and continues to plant and harvest coffee. She is a responsible and kind person who works to get her family ahead. She is requesting a loan to buy fertilizers and seeds. She is happy to receive this loan and promises to comply with the repayment terms.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seeds

loans.name: Telma Emilia

texts.es:
Telma tiene 36 años de edad, tiene tres hijos. Desde hace seis años se dedica a la venta de atoles, inicio vendiendo en pequeñas cantidades a su vecinos y hoy en día sale a vender alrededor de todo el pueblo. Antes solo se dedicaba a realizar los oficios domésticos en su casa. Los insumos para elaborar los atoles los compra un día antes en las tiendas de su pueblo y los transporta en un recipiente hasta su casa que esta a medio kilómetro del lugar. 

El préstamo que esta solicitando es para comprar arroz, maíz, azúcar, canela, etc. Para elaborar el atole. Incrementar su dinero para comprar más hierro y chatarra. De esta manera, tendrá disponibilidad de adquirir más producto para venderlos posteriormente. Su propósito, es siempre trabajar bien fuerte para apoyar a su familia en todo.
texts.en: Telma is 36 years old and has three children. She has been selling atole [a warm, corn-based beverage] for six years. She started selling it in small quantities to her neighbors, and today she goes out to sell it all over town. Before this, she was dedicated solely to domestic duties at home. Telma buys the ingredients for preparing atole a day ahead of time at stores in her town and then transports them back to her house, which is half a kilometer away. The loan she is requesting is for buying rice, corn, sugar, cinnamon, etc. for preparing atole. It will also increase her funds for buying scrap iron and junk. This way, she will have more products available to sell. Her goal is always to work hard to support her family in every way.

loans.use: to buy rice, corn, sugar, cinnamon, etc. for making atole

loans.name: Luis Gualberto

texts.es: El socio continúa en uno de los bancos comunales de la Asociación Arariwa y con la siembre y cosecha de café. El es una persona responsable y amable que saca adelante a su familia. Solicita el préstamo para comprar fertilizantes y semillas. Está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: Luis continues with one of Arariwa Association's communal banks and the planting and harvesting of coffee. He is a responsible and kind person who is getting his family ahead. He is requesting a loan to buy fertilizer and seeds. He is happy about the loan and is committed to making his payments.

loans.use: to buy fertilizar and seeds.

loans.name: José Santos

texts.es:
Don José tiene 53 años de edad, es viudo y tiene dos hijos. Él tiene tres años de administrar su propia tienda en su casa, la idea surgió debido a la necesidad de llevar un ingreso extra a su familia. Aprendió este negocio, a través de unos amigos que tienen negocios. Él, además siempre se ha dedicado a prestar sus servicios de vigilante. 

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar queso, crema, guajada, entre otros lácteos, para vender en la tienda y también sus hijos saldrán a vender casa por casa. Esto lo hace debido a que José ha identificado que esos nuevos productos le dejaran buenas ganancias, además que satisfará la necesidad de sus clientes que le buscan estos productos. Él necesita obtener buenos ingresos, ya que solo él trabaja y busca mejorar la salud, alimentación y vestuario de su familia y sabe que a través de su negocio lo puede realizar, ya que solo con el salario que recibe por prestar sus servicios como vigilante no le alcanza. 

Su propósito es que su negocio crezca, para atender mejor a sus clientes y mejorar su vivienda; para dejar de laborar como vigilante algún día; ya que nos comenta que es muy peligroso y solo quedarse con el negocio.
texts.en:
José is 53 years old.  He’s a widower and has two children.  He’s been running a store out of his home for three years.  He got the idea because he needed to bring an extra income into the family and he learned the business from some friends with similar businesses.  He also works as a guard.

The loan he is requesting through Fundación Campo is to buy cheese, cream, and other milk products to sell in his store and for his children to sell door to door.  Jose does this because he noticed that these new products bring him good earnings and he is able to satisfy his customers’ needs for these products.  He needs to generate a good income since he is the only one who works and he wants to improve his family’s health, feeding, and clothing and he knows that he can do it through his business because he doesn’t earn enough as a guard.

He hopes to expand his business so that he can better serve his customers and improve his home.  He wants to stop working as a guard some day because he says that it’s dangerous.   He prefers to focus on his business.

loans.use: to buy milk products for his store.

loans.name: Huaraypata Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “HUARAYPATA”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Urcos, perteneciente a la provincia de Quispicanchis y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Juana Paula ella es casada y tiene 44 años y tiene 5 hijos; La socia trabaja en su negocio de crianza de animales, la socia cría animales como cuyes y gallinas, ella los hace engordar y crecer y luego los vende en las diferentes ferias, la socia también trabaja en un centro donde cuidan niños, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m,la socia tiene 8 años en su negocio de crianza de animales, por medio de su trabajo y negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde venda los animales. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar animales y alimentos para los animales.
Los socios que están pegados a la foto grupal se les tomo después la foto porque pidieron permiso por motivos de trabajo.
 Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de tienda de abarrotes, negocio de crianza de cuyes, negocio de agricultura y negocio de venta de animales.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
These members belong to the “HUARAYPATA” communal bank, located in the Urcos district, part of the Quispicanchis province and the Cusco department.

Juana Paula is 44 years old, married, and has five children.  She raises animals such as Guinea pigs and chickens and sells them at different fairs.  She also works in a day care center from 8:00 am to 5:00 pm.  She’s had her animal business for more than eight years and wants to get her children ahead through her business.  She is asking for this loan in order to buy animals and feed.

The members who’s photographs are attached had their pictures taken later because of work.

The rest of the members have grocery stores, raise Guinea pigs, farm, and sell animals.

[Juana Paula] is grateful to those who form a part of this dream and promises to make her payments on schedule.

loans.use: to buy animals and feed.

loans.name: Aparicio Santiago

texts.es:
El socio  el Sr. Aparicio Santiago; el socio sigue dedicandose a ejercer su carrera de abogado ,el socio cuenta con un estudio juridico donde presta asesoramiento a sus clientes que le solicitan,el socio lleva años ejerciendo su carrera el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia a su trabajo,siendo de esta forma que el socio saca adelante a su familia.
EL socio solicita el credito para pagar los estudios de uno de sus hijos.

 El socio solicita el préstamo para pagar los estudios de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Aparicio Santiago continues his career as a lawyer and provides legal advice to his clients in his office.  He has been doing this for several years and his career is doing well, thanks to the effort he puts forth every day.  He gets his family ahead in this manner.

He is asking for a loan to pay tuition for one of his children.

loans.use: to pay tuition.

loans.name: Delfin Leopoldo

texts.es: El socio continúa en uno de los bancos comunales de la Asociacion Arariwa de la ciudad del Cusco y con el servicio de trasporte público. Es una persona responsable y amable que saca adelante a su familia. Solicita el préstamo para hacer mantenimiento del carro. Está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member still belongs to one of Asociacion Arariwa's communal banks in the city of Cusco. He continues to work offering public transportation services.

He is a responsible and kind person who provides for his family. He is requesting this loan to do maintenance on his car. He is happy with the loan and promises to pay his installments.

loans.use: to maintain his car.

loans.name: Aracely Del Carmen

texts.es:
Aracely tiene 30 años de edad, es casada y tiene un hijo. Ella tiene cinco años de dedicarse a la venta de ropa. La mercadería la adquiere en la ciudad y viaja cada quince días. 

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar más mercadería para la temporada navideña. De esta manera, dispondrá de suficiente dinero para comprar más ropa y venderla en la temporada navideña; para obtener mejores ingresos para la familia y satisfacer a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Aracely, 30, is married and has a son. She has worked in clothing sales for five years. 

She acquires the merchandise in the city; she travels there twice a month. The loan she is requesting from Fundación Campo is to buy more merchandise for the holiday season. This way, she will have enough money to buy more clothes and sell them during the holiday season; to earn better income for her family and satisfy her customers.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise for the holiday season.

loans.name: Vírginia Del Carmen

texts.es:
Virginia tiene 44 años de edad, es casada y tiene cuatro hijos. Vive junto a su esposo e hijos en una casa alquilada desde hace 18 años. Ella es una persona muy trabajadora se dedica al comercio de cosméticos y a la venta de lotería esto le produce unos muy buenos ingresos de dinero ella sueña con ver terminada su casa pero por el alto costo de la vida no ha podido terminar de construir su casa y tienen que andar alquilando y exponiéndose a que cualquier cosa le pueda pasar ha ella y su familia en la casa que están viviendo actualmente.

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar cables, lámparas y pago de mano de obra para la instalación de la luz eléctrica. Debido a  que su padre le ha dado un terreno para que pueda vivir ya tiene construida su casa pero le falta la luz eléctrica y con la ayuda del crédito la podrá realizar.
 La principal necesidad que será satisfecha es que podrá comprar todos los materiales que necesita de una sola vez y así obtenerlos a un mejor precio, además que dispondrá del efectivo para pagarle al encargado de la instalación.
texts.en:
Virginia is 44 years old and married with four children. She has been living with her husband and kids in a rented home for eighteen years. She is a very hard worker. She sells cosmetics and lottery for a living, and this is a very good source of income for her. Her dream is to see her house finally finished, but because of the high cost of living she has not been able to finish building it, which is why they have to rent and live exposed to anything that might happen to her and her family at their current home.

The loan she is requesting from Fundación Campo is to purchase cables and lamps and to pay for having electricity installed. Her father has given her a piece of land for her to live on and her house has already been built, but it still needs electrical power. This loan will allow her to install it by enabling her to purchase all of the materials she needs at once so that she can get them at a better price. Plus she will have enough cash available to pay the installers.

loans.use: to buy cables and lamps, and to pay for the labor involved in installing electricity.

loans.name: Norberta

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de gaanderia y tambien se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de leche,el socio vende los ganados en las diferentes ferias,la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene 5 años en estos negocios y le va muy bien,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de venta de leche y ganados.La socia solicita el credito para comprar comida para los ganados y tambien para comprar un ganado.

La socia esta feliz con el credito y se compromete a cumplir los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Norberta is continuing with her livestock business and her business selling milk.  She sells cows at the various markets.  She works from 8am until 5pm.  She's had these businesses already for 5 years, and it is going very well for her.  

Norberta's dream is to expand her milk and livestock business.  She is requesting a loan to buy cattle feed and also to buy a cow.

Norberta is happy with this loan, and she promises to comply with the payment terms.

loans.use: to buy cattle feed and a cow

loans.name: Anacleta

texts.es:
La socia Anacleta se dedica al negocio de agricultura,la socia tiene un terreno donde siembra papa,maiz y trigo,la socia tambien se dedica al negocio de crianza de animales como cuyes y gallinas,la socia los hace engordar y crecer y luego los vende en el mercado,la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene 5 años en estos negocios y le va muy bien.La socia solicita el credito para comprar cuyes y gallinas.

La socia esta feliz ocn el credito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Anacleta is a farmer who has some land where she cultivates potatoes, corn and wheat.  She also has a business raising animals such as guinea pigs and hens.  She fattens them and allows them to grow, and later sells them in the market.  She works from 8am until 5pm.  She's already had these businesses for 5 years, and they are doing well.  She is requesting a loan to buy guinea pigs and hens.

Anacleta is happy with this loan, and she promises to comply with the payment terms.

loans.use: to buy guinea pigs and hens

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy sand and cement, and pay a builder, as they are repairing their house

loans.name: Luz Marina

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de tienda de abarrotes,la socia vende productos de primera necesidad como arroz,azucar,leche y aceite,la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene 8 años en este negocio y le va muy bien,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de tienda de abarrotes.La socia solicita el credito para comprar arroz,azucar,leche y aceite.

La socia esta contenta con el credito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
[Luz Marina] continues running her grocery store and sells primary needs products such as rice, sugar, milk, and cooking oil.  She works from 8:00 am to 6:00 pm and has been doing so for eight years.  Things are going well for her and her dream is to expand her grocery store.  She is asking for this loan to buy rice, sugar, milk, and cooking oil.

She is grateful for the loan and promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to stock her store.

loans.name: Octavia

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de ganaderia y tambien sigue brindando servicio de transporte interprovincial,la socia tiene ganados y los vende en las diferentes ferias,la socia ya tiene 7 años en este negocio y le va muy bien,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de ganaderia.La socia solicita el credito para comprar un ganado.

La socia esta feliz con el credito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de sus cuotas.
texts.en:
Octavia is continuing with her livestock business, and also her business providing inter-province transportation services.  She has cows that she sells in the different markets.  She's had this business for 7 years already, and it is going very well.  

Octavia's dream is to expand her livestock business.  She is requesting a loan to buy a cow.

Octavia is pleased to be getting this loan, and she promises to comply with the payment terms.

loans.use: to buy a cow

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy seeds and farming supplies

loans.name: Damaris

texts.es:
Damaris es madre de dos hijos menores de edad, vive con su esposo en la provincia de Puntarenas, ella ha venido desarrollando un proyecto agrícola, se trata de hacer un semillero de palma de jardín, para venderlo a otros viveros y tener disponible un almácigo durante todo el año, y de esta manera podrá abastecer la demanda de esta planta que es bastante cotizada.
El objetivo de Damaris es ayudar económicamente a su esposo, ya que los gastos del hogar son muy altos . Ella necesita un crédito de un millón de colones (¢1.000.000), para comprar semilla tratada e insumos agrícolas para proteger la planta durante su desarrollo.
texts.en:
Damaris is the mother of two minor children.  She lives with her husband in the Puntarenas province and has been developing her farming plan, raising garden palms to sell to other nurseries and have a collection year round.  In this way she can meet the demand for this plant which is well sought after.

Damaris’ objective is to help her husband financially with the household expenses which are very high.  She needs a loan for 1,000,000 Colones to buy treated seeds and farming supplies to protect the plants during their development.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies.

loans.name: Andrea

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de compra y venta de leche,la socia vende leche en forma ambulatoria llevando a diferente lugares,la socia tambien se sigue dedicando al negocio de agricultura y venta de madera,por medio de estos negocios la socia saca adelante a sus hijos,el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender leche.La socia solicita el credito para comprar leche.

La socia se siente agradecida por el credito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
This member still works buying and selling milk. She conducts her business as a traveling merchant, bringing the milk to different locations. She also continues to work farming and selling wood. These businesses allow her to provide for her children. This member's dream is to have her own store to sell her milk. 

This member is requesting a loan to purchase milk. She is grateful for the loan and promises to comply with her payment plan.

loans.use: to purchase milk.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Shalom Isabel

texts.es: La socia continúa en el banco comunal de la Asociación Arariwa y con la venta de cosméticos. Ella es una persona responsable y amable que saca adelante a su familia. Solicita el préstamo para comprar perfumes, aretes, collares y otras cosas más. Está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: [Shalom Isabel] continues to be a part of the Asociación Arariwa communal band and continues selling cosmetics.  She is a responsible, friendly person who moves her family ahead.  She is asking for a loan in order to buy perfumes, ear rings, necklaces, and some other things.  She is happy about the loan and promises to pay on time.

loans.use: to buy inventory.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy supplies to make repairs to her house

loans.name: Leonarda

texts.es: La clienta Leonarda, tiene 38 Años, vive en el trópico de Cochabamba en la localidad de Rio Blanco, es madre de cinco hijos actualmente se dedica la comercio de venta de comida, La señora  vino al trópico, del municipio de Entre Ríos buscando  mayor oportunidad de trabajo, porque en su comunidad en los últimos tiempos afecto los desborde de los ríos y afecto a sus cultivos, apenas alcanzaba  para sobrevivir. Cuando llegó indica, que se vino con unas cuantas ropas a la casa de un tío, ahí se conoció  con su esposo que ahora es, en los primeros años que vino ayudaba en su parcela de su tío como ayudante o jornalero, aun  no podía encontrar un trabajo seguro, poco a poco fue aprendiendo el negocio de la comida y empezó, para posteriormente dedicarse a este rubro, trabaja muy duro para sacar adelante a sus hijos y que no le falte nada en un futuro. Con el transcurso del tiempo fue  ahorrando y ahora quiere comprarse una parcela aumentando el crédito que esta solicitando. Su esposo actualmente esta trabajando como jornalero en diferentes parcelas que hay en la comunidad de Rio Blanco.
texts.en: Leonarda is 38 years old and lives in Rio Blanco in Cochabamba.  She’s the mother of five children and sells food.  She came to this tropical area from Entre Ríos, looking for better work opportunities because the river floods really affected her community and crops.  There was barely enough left on which to survive.  She says that she arrived at her uncle’s home with a just few pieces of clothing.  That is where she met her husband.  During her first few years she would work as a field hand on a parcel of her uncle’s farm land.  She was not able to find steady work.  Little by little she began learning the food business and began to focus on this field.  She works very hard to get her children ahead so that they want for nothing in the future.  Over time she began saving up and now wants to buy a parcel of land.  Her husband works as a field hand on different parcels around the Rio Blanco community.

loans.use: to buy farmland.

loans.name: Juan Bautista

texts.es: El señor Juan Bautista tiene 29 años de edad, vive con su esposa Herminia, su domicilio esta ubicado en la comunidad de Buena Vista a unos 40 km de la Ciudad de Monteagudo. Sus principales actividades de los clientes es la producción de maíz y papa, llegando a cultivar una vez durante al año, están solicitando crédito  para el preparado del terreno, compra de semilla y siembra ya que es época para la siembra de maíz y no cuenta con recursos para comprarlos.  Juan Bautista  y Herminia  tienen 2 hijas y que una se encuentra estudiando en la escuela de la comunidad de Vallecito, ya que en la comunidad donde ellos viven no existe escuela, es por eso que sus padres quieren mejorar sus ingresos para cubrir los gastos de estudios, útiles, ropas y otros de sus hijas que tiene y así puedan concluir sus estudios hasta salir profesionales y tener una mejor vida.
texts.en:
Juan Bautista is 29 years old and lives with his wife Herminia. Their home is located in the community of Buena Vista about 40 miles from the city of Monteagudo. Their main activity is the production of corn and potatoes and they cultivate once a year.

They are requesting a loan for land preparation, seed purchase and planting as it is time to plant the corn and they don't have the resources to buy it. 

Juan Bautista and Herminia have two daughters. One is studying at the school in Vallecito because the community where they live doesn't have a school. Because of this, the parents want to improve their income to cover the cost of studies, tools, clothing and other things for their daughters so they can complete their studies so they become professionals and have a better life.

loans.use: to prepare the land, to buy seeds, and to plant.

loans.name: Francisca

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de crianza de animales como cuyes y gallina,la socia los hace engordar y crecer y luego los vende en las diferentes mercados,la socia ya se dedica a este negocio 4 años y le va muy bien,el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender los animales.La socia solicita el credito para comprar cuyes y gallinas.

La socia esta agradecida con el credito y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member continues in the business of raising animals such as guinea pigs and chickens.  She fattens them and then sells them in the various markets.  She has made a living in this business for four years and it's going very well for her.  Her dream is to have a place to sell her animals.

She's requesting the loan to buy guinea pigs and chickens.

She's grateful for the loan and committed to making her payments punctually.

loans.use: to buy guinea pigs and chickens

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy garden tools.

loans.name: Gabriela Rozaura

texts.es: Gabriela es una joven de 26 años de edad, trabajaba en un empresa pero fue despedida razón por la cual se tuvo que ir a trabajar a la Argentina junto a su papá para poder ahorrar dinero y colocar una peluquería, tuvo muchas complicaciones para poder juntar dinero, pero logro ahorrar y volvió  a bolivia. Con el dinero que junto pudo colocar un peluquería en la  planta baja de la casa que pertenece a sus papas, Gabriela es mamá soltera tuvo una muy mala experiencia con el papá de su hijita quien la abandono al enterarse de su embarazo así que ella se hace cargo de todos los gastos de la niña. Necesita el dinero para poder comprar insumos para la peluquería y para la compra de mercadería  de AVON ya que también se dedica a la veta por catalogo de cosméticos  y para fin de año las ventas se incrementan considerablemente ósea que es una forma de mejorar sus ingresos y la calidad de vida de ella y su hijita.
texts.en:
Gabriela, 26, used to work for a company but was let go, so she had to go to work in Argentina with her father to be able to save money and set up a beauty shop.  She had a lot of problems getting the money together, but she managed to save and return to Bolivia.  With the money she set up a beauty salon on the ground floor of the house that belongs to her parents.

Gabriela's a single mother.  She had a very bad experience with the father of her little girl.  He abandoned her when he found out she was pregnant, so she's responsible for all the child's expenses.

She needs the money to be able to buy supplies for the beauty salon and Avon merchandise, because she also makes a living selling cosmetics via catalogue.  Demand increases considerably at the end of the year, so it's a way to improve her income as well as the quality of life for herself and her young daughter.

loans.use: to buy hairdressing supplies and cosmetics

loans.name: Maria Consuelo

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de crianza de animales como gallinas,pollos,chanchos y cuyes,la socia los hace engordar y crecer y luego los vende en las diferentes ferias y mercados,la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene 8 años en este negocio y le va muy bien,el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender los animales.La socia solicita el credito para comprar alimentos para los animales y para comprar pollos,cuyes y chanchos.

La socia se encuentra agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
The member continues to make her living raising animals such as hens, chickens, pigs and guinea pigs.  She raises and fattens them, and then sells them in various fairs and markets.  She works from 8:00am until 5:00pm.  She has had this business for 8 years, and it is going very well.

The member's dream is to have a store where she can sell the animals.  The member is applying for the loan to buy animal feed and to buy chickens, guinea pigs and pigs.  She is grateful for the opportunity available to her and pledges to make the necessary payments on time.

loans.use: to buy animal feed and to buy chickens, guinea pigs and pigs.

loans.name: Magali

texts.es: La señora Magali, tiene 28 años, es una persona joven y muy humilde, tiene una hija de 6 años que depende de ella,  la cual se encuentra estudiando en primero básico, por lo cual demanda gastos de estudios, salud, ropa y otros, es por ese motivo la clienta se dedica a la elaboración y venta de pan,  la cual lo elabora ella sola y lo entrega a las tiendas de su barrio; adicionalmente también se dedica a la compra y venta de ropa de vestir. El diario vivir de Magali es muy agotador, ella lucha día a día para llegar a tener un futuro mejor. Magali quiere aumentar la producción de pan, por ello necesita el financiamiento de dinero para comprar insumos de elaboración de pan, por lo consiguiente generar mayores ingresos, que es lo que mas necesita para mejorar la condición de vida de ella y de su hija.
texts.en:
Magali, 28, is a young and very humble person. She has a 6 year old daughter who is dependent on her. Her daughter is in first grade, which requires expenses for education, health, clothing and other things. This is why Magali works making and selling bread (which she does on her own), and delivers it to the stores in her neighborhood. In addition, she also buys and sells clothing. 

Magali's daily life is very exhausting; every day, she struggles toward a better future. Magali wants to increase the production of bread, for which she needs financing to buy supplies so she can generate more revenue, which is what she most needs to improve living conditions for herself and her daughter.

loans.use: to buy raw materials to make bread.

loans.name: Gilbert

texts.es: El señor Gilbert tiene 28 años de edad conviviente con la Sra. Judith tienen 2 hijos menores que estudian en nivel primaria, ellos se dedican a la actividad agrícola es la fuente de sus ingresos económicos producen papa, en terreno de 1,5 Has en la comunidad de Liquintaya, siembra con rotación de cultivos, Don Gilbert tiene mucha experiencia en la actividad, viven en una comunidad rural Liquintaya  a 56 km de la ciudad de Cochabamba por lo tanto para ellos es muy difícil acudir a los Bancos para un préstamo de dinero además les piden muchos requisitos, Don Gilbert necesita dinero de urgencia para comprar insumos agrícolas abono orgánico (gallinaza), el ahorro que tenían lo prestaron a su hermano para que construya su propia casa, por que estaba viviendo en la casa de su suegra compartían entre varias personas  la casa y vivir para ellos era incomodo en casa ajena.
texts.en:
Gilbert, 28, lives with Judith.  They have two minor children who are in elementary school.  He makes a living in agriculture, the source of their income.  He grows potatoes on a 1.5-hectare plot of land in the community of Liquintaya, and rotates the plantings.  Gilbert has a lot of experience in this job.

They live in a rural community, Liquintaya, 56 kilometers from the city of Cochabamba, so it's very difficult for them to get to the banks for a loan.  In addition, the banks have a lot of requirements.

Gilbert says they needed money urgently to buy agricultural supplies, organic manure (poultry).  They loaned their savings to his brother to build his own house, because the brother was living in his mother-in-law's house with various other people, so it was not comfortable living in a strange house.

loans.use: to buy poultry manure

loans.name: Norma

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de ganaderia,la socia cria vacas los hace engordar y luego los vende en las ferias,la socia ya tiene 6 años en este negocio,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de ganaderia,en sus tiempos libres a la socia le gusta preparar tortas.La socia solicita el credito para comprar un ganado y comprar alimento para los ganados.

La socia esta contenta con el credito y se compromete a cumplir los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: Norma still has a cattle business.  She raises cows, fattens them, and sells them at fairs.  She has had this business for 6 years.  Her dream is to grow her cattle business.  In her free time she likes to bake cakes.  She is requesting a loan to purchase a cow and to purchase feed for her cattle.  She is happy with the loan and promises to make her payments.

loans.use: to purchase a cow and to purchase feed for her cattle.

loans.name: Humberto

texts.es: El señor Humberto tiene 35 años de edad, vive con su esposa Yolanda, su domicilio esta ubicado en la comunidad del Puente a unos 45 km de la Ciudad de Monteagudo. Su principal actividad  es la cría de cerdos mejorados, los crían en corrales rústicos por ello que esta solicitando crédito para poder mejorar el techo del galpón ya que se encuentra en mal estado y comprara semilla de pasto para sembrarlo y tener alimento para el ganado vacuno que tiene y con el alambre encerrara el terreno así tener sus animales en un lugar mas seguro. Humberto  y Yolanda  tienen 3 hijos que se encuentran actualmente estudiando, es por eso que sus padres quieren mejorar sus ingresos para cubrir los gastos de estudios, útiles, ropas y otros de sus hijos y así puedan concluir sus estudios hasta salir profesionales y tener una mejor vida.
texts.en: Humberto, 35, lives with his wife Yolanda. Their home is located in the Puente community, about 45 kilometers from the city of Monteagudo. His main job is raising pigs. He raises them in rustic corrals. He is applying for a loan to improve the roof of the shed, because it is in a bad state, and to buy seed for pasture grasses to plant it and have food for his cattle. He will enclose his land with wire and that way his animals will be in a more secure place. Humberto and Yolando have three children who are currently studying. The parents want to increase their income in order to cover the costs of school, supplies, clothing, and other needs their children have. That way, they can finish their schooling, become professionals, and have a better life.

loans.use: to improve the roof of his shed and buy seed for animal feed.

loans.name: Santiago

texts.es: El solicitante Santiago,  solo curso  hasta primaria en la escuela de su Comunidad  de estado civil  soltero mayor de edad  vive actualmente en la  Comunidad Sullcavi Titiri de prov. aroma y desde muy joven se fue al país del Brasil trabajo varios años como empleado  y no ganaba un buen sueldo mas bien trabajo como esclavitud en otro país y luego cuando su papá  falleció en la Comunidad y volvió el Santiago a su Comunidad origen para cuidar  a su mamá tiene edad de 85 años.  Por el cual que su mamá le dieron terreno para que trabaje con producción de agrícola.  Como no tiene mucho recursos económicos, el necesita para mejorar la producción y para comprar una  bomba de agua con su accesorios y también compra un ganado vacuno lechera para producir queso y la  mejores ganancias para sobre salir   adelante.
texts.en: Santiago only finished elementary school at his neighborhood school.  He is single and lives in the Sullcavi Titiri community within the Aroma province.  When he was young he went to Brazil to work but didn’t earn a good salary.  He worked like a slave and returned to his native community to care for his 85 year old mother when his father passed away.  His mother gave him some farmland to work and he needs resources to increase his production, buy a water pump, and a dairy cow so that he can use the milk to make cheese.  This will increase his income so that he can get ahead.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies and a cow.

loans.name: Ana

texts.es: La señora Ana tiene 39 años de edad, vive con su esposo Pastor, su domicilio esta ubicado en la comunidad de Vallecito a unos 40 km de la Ciudad de Monteagudo. Sus principales actividades de los clientes son la crianza de cerdos cabañeros y  producción de maíz, los cerdos los cría en corrales rústicos y vende cada 6 meses durante el año, el maíz vende una parte y resto es para prepáralo el alimento de sus cerdos que tiene, ellos necesitan dinero para compra de alimento balanceado. Ana  y Pastor  tienen 4 hijas y que una se encuentra estudiando, un en la escuela de la comunidad de Vallecito, otras 2 en el internado, y la mayor en la Universidad de la ciudad de Sucre, es por eso que sus padres quieren mejorar sus ingresos para cubrir los gastos de estudios, útiles, ropas y otros de sus hijas que tiene y así puedan concluir sus estudios hasta salir profesionales y tener una mejor vida.
texts.en:
Ana is 39 years old. She lives with her husband Pastor.  Their home is located in the community of Vallecito, which is about 40 km from the city of Monteagudo.  These clients' main activies are raising pigs and growing corn.  The pigs are raised in rustic corrals and are sold every six months during the year.  They sell part of the corn and the rest is used to prepare feed for the pigs.  They need money to purchase balanced feed.  

Ana and Pastor have 4 daughters who are in school.  One attends school in the community of Vallecito, 2 others are in boarding school, and the eldest attends University in the city of Sucre.  For this reason, their parents want to increase their income to cover the costs of their daughters' schooling, supplies, clothing, etc. so they can finish their studies, become professionals, and have a better life.

loans.use: to purchase balanced feed.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase materials to complete his home.

loans.name: Juan

texts.es: El señor  Juan es nacido en Tiraque del Departamento de Cochabamba, actualmente vive con su padres en su comunidad es soltero, la descripción de su casa es rustico está construido de barro con techo de teja con revoques de barro la determinación de la vivienda es prácticamente rustico, la comunidad del cliente esta ubicado a 8 km al norte de la localidad de Tiraque. La actividad económica es la agricultura que produce tubérculos y cereales, la producción es estacional en la zona son alturas del valle alto. El préstamo que está solicitando es para la comprar abono y arboles para leña, el cliente tiene interés de superarse sus ingresos económicos en los próximos años como también mejorar la calidad de vida en su familia, es por eso nos visita ara solicitar el préstamo de nuestra Entidad, los trabajos agrícolas lo realizan mayor parte toda la familia en algunos casos utiliza ayuda de sus vecinos para la siembra y la cosecha.
texts.en:
Juan was born in Tiraque, within the Cochabamba department.  He lives with his parents and he’s single.  It’s a rustic house located 8km north of Tiraque.  It’s an agricultural community that produces tubers and grains.  Production is seasonal in the high valley.

This loan is so that he can buy fertilizer and trees for firewood.  He wants to increase his income in the next few years and also improve his family’s quality of life, so he has requested a loan through our institution.  Most of his family does the work on the farm, but sometimes he gets help from his neighbors during planting and harvesting.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and firewood.

loans.name: Dúo Misión Santa Group

texts.es:
DUO MISIÓN SANTA
Doña Maria Emiliana es originaria de la aldea Xetzac Municipio de Tecpan, ella se dedica a la elaboración de cortes con telares desde hace varios años y a la venta de cortes, gracias a Dios su negocio a crecido bastante ya que ella empezó con un solo telar y ahora cuenta con cuatro telares.
Ella tiene sus telares en su casa su esposo es el que lo trabaja gracias al apoyo de toda su familia ella sigue trabajando ya que ahora tiene entrega de sus cortes en los municipio y departamentos cercanos,  ya dio a conocer sus productos en el mercado y  ahora ya la conocen sus clientelas.
El sueño de ella es ampliar mas su negocio comprar dos telares mas para poder obtener mejores ganancias y mejorar la vida de su familia y asi  mandar a sus hijos a estudiar para un futuro mejor, está solicitando este crédito para la compra de materia prima para la confección de tejidos tipicos.
texts.en:
DUO MISIÓN SANTA

Maria Emiliana is originally from the Xetzac village in the town of Tecpan. For several years, she has worked weaving skirts on looms and then selling the skirts. Thankfully business has grown enough since she started with one loom that she now has four looms. She has her looms at home; her husband works. With the support of her entire family, she continues to work and has deliveries of her skirts going to the surrounding towns, now that her product is well-known in the market and her clients know her. 

Her dream is to expand the business to buy two more looms to earn better profits and improve the lives of her family and this way send their children to school for a better future. She is requesting this loan for the purchase of raw materials for the weaving of traditional textiles.

loans.use: to buy raw materials to weave traditional textiles.

loans.name: Dúo Cantares Group

texts.es:
DUO CANTARES
Doña Santos es originario de la aldea Xenimajuyu municipio de Tecpan ella tiene un hijo menor de edad y cuenta con una tienda de venta de artículos de consumo diario su tienda se ubica en el centro de Tecpan. También ella se dedica a la crianza de pollos, son los medios  que ella tiene para salir adelante con su familia.
Ella empezó con una pequeña tiendecita y gracias a Dios conforme el tiempo ha pasado su negocio a prosperado y ahora su tienda ya lo tiene mas surtido y con una variedad de productos  que ofrecer a sus clientelas, está solicitando este crédito para la compra de productos comestibles para la venta.
texts.en:
DUO CANTARES

Santos is a native of Xenimajuyu village in the municipality of Tecpan. She has a child of minor age and a shop that sells items for daily consumption. Her shop is located in the center of Tecpan. She also raises chickens. These are the means by which she and her family get by.

She started with a small little shop and thankfully, her business has prospered over time and now her store has more stock and a variety of products to offer customers. She is requesting this loan to buy food products to sell.

loans.use: to buy food products to sell.

loans.name: Yanet

texts.es:
La socia Yanet continua dedicandose al negocio de crianza de animales menores como cuyes entre otros,la socia cria a estos animalitos para luego venderlos a sus clientes que le solicitan,la socia a la vez continua con su negocio de compra y venta de maiz,la socia lleva buen tiempo en sus negocios el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia a sus negocios,la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el credito para la compra de alimentos para sus animalitos como maiz,alfalfa y para algunos gastos personales.


La socia se siente agradecida por el credito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
This member, named Yanet, continues to work at her business raising small animals such as guinea pigs and others. She raises these animals to sell them later to customers who order them from her. She is also continuing with her business buying and selling corn. She has worked at her businesses for awhile and thanks to the hard work she puts into them every day, it is going well for her. She wants to keep being able to work and keep working so she can continue supporting her family.

She is asking for the loan to to buy feed for her animals such as corn and alfalfa, as well as for some personal expenses.

Yanet is grateful for the loan and committed to making her payments.

loans.use: to buy feed for her animals such as corn and alfalfa as well as to pay for some personal expenses.

loans.name: Nazario

texts.es:
El socio el Sr. Nazario;el socio continua dedicandose a  brindar el servicio de taxi,a la vez continua dedicandose a la compra y venta de madera ,el socio es una persona responsable y empeñosa siendo de esta forma que el socio saca adelante a su familia. 

El socio solicita el credito para realizar el mantenimiento de su carro y para algunos gastos personales.

El socio se siente agradecido por el credito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
Nazario continues to work providing taxi services, while he also continues to work buying and selling timber. He is a responsible and earnest person, and being such, he gets his family ahead.

He is seeking a loan to maintain his car and for some personal expenses. He is grateful for the loan and is committed to meeting his payment schedule.

loans.use: to maintain his car and for some personal expenses.

loans.name: Laura

texts.es:
La socia Laura continua dedicandose al negocio de compra y venta de leche,leña y crianza de animales menores como pollos,la socia lleva buen tiempo con sus negocios los cuales le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone a cada uno de ellos,la socia desea poder seguir trabajando con sus negocios para de esta forma poder seguir apoyando a su familia.


La socia solicita el credito para la compra de leña para su negocio. 
La socia se siente agradecida por el credito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
The member Laura remains dedicated to the business of buying and selling milk, firewood, and small livestock like chickens.The member is in a good period with her businesses which are going well thanks to the commitment she brings to each on of them. The member wants to continue working with her businesses in this way to be able to continue supporting her family.

The member is requesting a credit to purchase firewood for her business.
The member is grateful for her 8th credit and promises to comply with her established payments.

loans.use: to purchase firewood for her business.

loans.name: Iris Margorth

texts.es:
La señora Iris tiene 31 años de edad, es casada y tiene un hijo de dos años. Se dedica a la venta y elaboración de pupusas en su casa de habitación con la ayuda de su mamá, ya tienen más de 3 años de realizar esta actividad. Las pupusas  las venden de lunes a sábado en su vivienda en horario de 5:00 p.m. a 7:30 p.m., cabe mencionar que también se dedican a la siembra de maíz y fríjol (actividad del papá) pero él les ayuda, es una actividad familiar ya tienen mas de 15 años de ejercerla. Actualmente cuenta con el mobiliario y equipo necesario para realizar dichas actividades.

Para ejercer la actividad de elaboración y comercio de las pupusas necesita comprar (maíz, chicharrón molido, quesillo, loroco, aceite, verduras como. repollo, zanahorias entre otros) estos productos los compra en el mercado municipal que se encuentra ubicado a dos kilómetros de su casa de habitación. Estos productos los compra una vez a la semana debido a que son perecederos y no los puede mantener en refrigeración por mucho tiempo.

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar 50 libras de maíz, 6  libras de chicharrón molido, 6  libras de quesillo especial, 3  libras de loroco, 1  plancha para hacer las pupusas con el sistema de gas incluido, Verduras como repollos, zanahorias. Etc. 

La ventaja de Iris, es que en el lugar donde vive es muy grande y sus pobladores son muchos la demanda de productos comestibles por la tarde es muy grande; por esta razón ella tuvo la idea de instalar la venta de pupusas en su casa de habitación.  

Al comprar los productos para la elaboración de las pupusas y que las ventas sean exitosas podrá obtener mayores ingresos, con estos ingresos pobra darle una mejor vida a su pequeño hijo y una buena estabilidad a su familia. Producto de la buena inversión del crédito  

La señora tiene planes a futuro como construir una pequeña vivienda, ya que donde viven actualmente es de sus padres y se quiere independizar. Para tener una vivienda propia.
texts.en:
Iris is 31 years old, is married and has a 2 year old son. For a living she sells and makes hand made tortillas in her home with the help of her mother. They already have more than 3 years in this trade. They sell the tortillas Monday through Saturday in their home from 5:00 PM to 7:30 PM. It's also worth mentioning that she also plants corn and beans (the trade of her father) but he helps them. It is a family trade and they have more than 15 years of doing it. Today she has the furnishings and equipment necessary to do these activities.

To do the work of making and selling the tortillas, she needs to buy (corn, ground pork, cheese, loroco, oil, and vegetables like cabbage, carrots, etc.) these products she purchases in the municipal market that located 2 kilometers from her house. She purchases these products one day a week since they are perishable and do not keep in refrigeration for long.

The loan that she is requesting from Fundación Campo (Field Foundation) is to buy 50 lbs of corn, 6 lbs of ground pork, 6 pounds of special cheese, 3 pounds of loroco, 1 gas iron, vegetables like cabbage, carrots, etc. 

The advantage of Iris, is that in the place where she lives it is very big and populated and there is a lot of demand for food in the evening.  For this reason she had the idea of selling hand made tortillas from her home. 

Due to purchase the products for the creation of handmade tortillas so that the sales will be successful, she will be able to obtain increased income. With this income she will be able to give a better life to her young son and stability to her family. 

As a product of the good investments of credit, she has future plans to construct a small house. Today they live with her parents and she want to be independent, by having her own home.

loans.use: To purchase 50 lbs of corn,  6 lbs of ground pork, 6 lbs of special cheese, 3 pounds of loroco (a flower), 1 gas grill to make hand made tortillas, and vegetables like cabbage, carrots, etc.

loans.name: Guadalupe

texts.es:
La señora Guadalupe Sánchez tiene 62 años de edad, es viuda y tiene cuatro hijos; pero ninguno vive con ella ya que están casados. Ella se dedicaba a la venta de antojitos (como, enchiladas, pasteles, yuca, refrescos entre otros productos estos los vendía en un centro escolar de la cuidad de forma ambulante. Esta actividad la ejerció por muchos años y fue de esta forma que le pudo brindar el estudio a sus hijos 4 hijos, 2 de estos se encuentran en los estados unidos de los cuales recibe ayuda económica. Actualidad, ya no cuenta con esta actividad debido a que los hijos se fueron para los estos unidos y le dejaron 2 nietos para que los cuide.

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar 200 ladrillos de cerámica decorada, 10 bolsas de cementó, Materiales para la instalación del piso y pago Mano de obra. Para mejoramiento de la vivienda cambiándole el piso ya que con el que cuanta esta dañado.

Entre sus planes a futuro están seguir con el mejoramiento de la vivienda, quiere hacer un muro perimetral de la vivienda, cambio de puertas y arreglo del techo siempre con la ayuda de las crédito de fundación campo.
texts.en:
Guadalupe Sánchez is 62 years old. She is widowed and has 4 children; but none of them live with her as they are married. She sells appetizers for a living (such as enchiladas, cakes, yuca, and drinks among other products). She sells these in a school center of the city on foot. She has done this trade for many years and it was this way that she was able to provide schooling for her 4 children, 2 of whom went to the United States and provide her economic assistance. Today she no longer does this trade since her children went to the United states and left 2 grandchildren in her care.

The loan that she is requesting from Fundación Campo (Field Foundation) is to purchase 200 pieces of decorated ceramic, 10 bags of cement, materials for floor installation and payment for labor. For improvements in her housing she is changing the floor as much of it is damaged.

Among her future plans she is continue with the improvement of her housing. She wants to make a wall around the perimeter of her house, change the doors and fix the roof, always with the help from the loan from Fundación Campo.

loans.use: to buy 200 pieces of decorated ceramic, 10 bags of cement, materials for floor installation and payment for labor.

loans.name: Selene

texts.es:
La socia Selene continua dedicandose al negocio de crianza de animales menores como cuyes ,gallinas y a la compra y venta de leche,la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa siendo de esta forma que la socia saca adelante  a su familia.


La socia solicita el credito para la compra de alimentos para sus animalitos como maiz,alfalfa y para algunos gastos personales.
La socia se siente agradecida por el credito otorgado y se compromete  a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
This member, named Selene, continues to work at her business raising small animals such as guinea pigs, and chickens. She also sells milk. She is a responsible and hardworking woman and this is how she gets her family ahead. 

She is asking for the loan to buy feed for her animals, such as corn and alfalfa, as well as to pay for some personal expenses. She is grateful for the loan and committed to making her payments.

loans.use: to buy feed for her animals, such as corn and alfalfa, as well as to pay for some personal expenses. .

loans.name: Ana Maria

texts.es:
La socia Ana Maria continua dedicandose al negocio de compra y venta de queso y a la compra y venta de granos secos como maiz,cebada entre otros,la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa siendo de esta forma que la socia saca adelante a su familia.

La socia solicita el credito para la compra de quesos para su negocio.
La socia se siente agradecida por el credito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
Ana Maria continues to dedicate herself to her business of buying and selling cheese and dried grains such as corn and barley, among others. She is a responsible and earnest person, and being such, she gets her family ahead.

She is requesting a loan to buy cheese for her business. She is grateful for the loan and committed to making her payments.

loans.use: to buy cheese for her business.

loans.name: Dúo Esfuerzate Y Se Valiente Group

texts.es: Dúo esfuerzate y se valiente. este grupo esta conformado por la señora Marta Estela quien se dedica a la elaboración de tejidos tipicos, tambien elabora bordados a mano, el sueño de ella es poder seguir creciendo en su negocio ya que solo de esa forma es como puede ayudar a su familia, está solicitando este credito para la compra de materia prima para la elaboracion de tejidos tipicos a mano.
texts.en: Marta Estela is a member of the 'Dúo Esferzate Y Se Valiente' [Be Strong and Courageous Duo].  She makes typical woven fabrics, and she also makes hand embroideries.  Her dream is to be able to continue growing in her business.  This is the only way she is able to help her family.  She is requesting this loan to buy raw material to weave typical textiles by hand.

loans.use: to buy raw material to weave typical textiles by hand.

loans.name: Encarno
